2006  KALDI_ASSERT(dim == InputDim() &&
2007  "input-dim mismatch vs. vector.");
2008  } else {
2009  if(!cfl->GetValue("dim", &dim))
2010  KALDI_ERR << "'dim' not provided in the config line.";
2011  BaseFloat param_mean = 1.0, param_stddev = 0.0;
2012  cfl->GetValue("param-mean", &param_mean);
2013  cfl->GetValue("param-stddev", &param_stddev);
2014  Init(dim, param_mean, param_stddev);
2015  }
2016  if (cfl->HasUnusedValues())
2017  KALDI_ERR << "Could not process these elements in initializer: "
2018  << cfl->UnusedValues();
2019 }
2020 
2021 void* PerElementScaleComponent::Propagate(
2022  const ComponentPrecomputedIndexes *indexes,
2023  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in,
2024  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *out) const {
2025  out->CopyFromMat(in);
2026  out->MulColsVec(scales_);
2027  return NULL;
2028 }
2029 
2030 void PerElementScaleComponent::UpdateSimple(
2031  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in_value,
2032  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_deriv) {
2033  scales_.AddDiagMatMat(learning_rate_, out_deriv, kTrans,
2034  in_value, kNoTrans, 1.0);
2035 }
2036 
2037 void PerElementScaleComponent::Backprop(
2038  const std::string &debug_info,
2039  const ComponentPrecomputedIndexes *indexes,
2040  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in_value,
2041  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &, // out_value
2042  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_deriv,
2043  void *memo,
2044  Component *to_update_in,
2045  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *in_deriv) const {
2046  PerElementScaleComponent *to_update =
2047  dynamic_cast<PerElementScaleComponent*>(to_update_in);
2048 
2049  if (to_update != NULL) {
2050  // Next update the model (must do this 2nd so the derivatives we propagate
2051  // are accurate, in case this == to_update_in.)
2052  if (to_update->is_gradient_)
2053  to_update->UpdateSimple(in_value, out_deriv);
2054  else // the call below is to a virtual function that may be re-implemented
2055  to_update->Update(debug_info, in_value, out_deriv); // by child classes.
2056  }
2057 
2058  if (in_deriv) {
2059  // Propagate the derivative back to the input.
2060  if (in_deriv->Data() != out_deriv.Data())
2061  in_deriv->CopyFromMat(out_deriv);
2062  in_deriv->MulColsVec(scales_);
2063  }
2064 }
2065 
2066 void PerElementScaleComponent::Read(std::istream &is, bool binary) {
2067  ReadUpdatableCommon(is, binary); // Read opening tag and learning rate.
2068  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<Params>");
2069  scales_.Read(is, binary);
2070  if (PeekToken(is, binary) == 'I') {
2071  // for back compatibility; we don't write this here any
2072  // more as it's written and read in Write/ReadUpdatableCommon
2073  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<IsGradient>");
2074  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &is_gradient_);
2075  }
2076  ExpectToken(is, binary, "</PerElementScaleComponent>");
2077 }
2078 
2079 void PerElementScaleComponent::Write(std::ostream &os, bool binary) const {
2080  WriteUpdatableCommon(os, binary); // Write opening tag and learning rate.
2081  WriteToken(os, binary, "<Params>");
2082  scales_.Write(os, binary);
2083  WriteToken(os, binary, "</PerElementScaleComponent>");
2084 }
2085 
2086 int32 PerElementScaleComponent::NumParameters() const {
2087  return InputDim();
2088 }
2089 
2090 void PerElementScaleComponent::Vectorize(VectorBase<BaseFloat> *params) const {
2091  params->CopyFromVec(scales_);
2092 }
2093 
2094 void PerElementScaleComponent::UnVectorize(
2095  const VectorBase<BaseFloat> &params) {
2096  scales_.CopyFromVec(params);
2097 }
2098 
2099 void PerElementOffsetComponent::Scale(BaseFloat scale) {
2100  if (scale == 0.0) {
2101  offsets_.SetZero();
2102  } else {
2103  offsets_.Scale(scale);
2104  }
2105 }
2106 
2107 
2108 void PerElementOffsetComponent::Add(BaseFloat alpha,
2109  const Component &other_in) {
2110  const PerElementOffsetComponent *other =
2111  dynamic_cast<const PerElementOffsetComponent*>(&other_in);
2112  KALDI_ASSERT(other != NULL);
2113  offsets_.AddVec(alpha, other->offsets_);
2114 }
2115 
2116 PerElementOffsetComponent::PerElementOffsetComponent(
2117  const PerElementOffsetComponent &component):
2118  UpdatableComponent(component),
2119  offsets_(component.offsets_),
2120  dim_(component.dim_),
2121  use_natural_gradient_(component.use_natural_gradient_),
2122  preconditioner_(component.preconditioner_) { }
2123 
2124 void PerElementOffsetComponent::PerturbParams(BaseFloat stddev) {
2125  CuVector<BaseFloat> temp_offsets(offsets_.Dim(), kUndefined);
2126  temp_offsets.SetRandn();
2127  offsets_.AddVec(stddev, temp_offsets);
2128 }
2129 
2130 std::string PerElementOffsetComponent::Info() const {
2131  std::ostringstream stream;
2132  stream << UpdatableComponent::Info()
2133  << ", offsets-min=" << offsets_.Min()
2134  << ", offsets-max=" << offsets_.Max()
2135  << ", block-dim=" << offsets_.Dim()
2136  << ", use-natural-gradient="
2137  << (use_natural_gradient_ ? "true" : "false");
2138  PrintParameterStats(stream, "offsets", offsets_, true);
2139  return stream.str();
2140 }
2141 
2142 Component* PerElementOffsetComponent::Copy() const {
2143  return new PerElementOffsetComponent(*this);
2144 }
2145 
2146 BaseFloat PerElementOffsetComponent::DotProduct(
2147  const UpdatableComponent &other_in) const {
2148  const PerElementOffsetComponent *other =
2149  dynamic_cast<const PerElementOffsetComponent*>(&other_in);
2150  return VecVec(offsets_, other->offsets_);
2151 }
2152 
2153 
2154 void PerElementOffsetComponent::InitFromConfig(ConfigLine *cfl) {
2155  std::string vector_filename;
2156  InitLearningRatesFromConfig(cfl);
2157  if (cfl->GetValue("vector", &vector_filename)) {
2158  ReadKaldiObject(vector_filename, &offsets_);
2159  dim_ = offsets_.Dim(); // if dim is not supplied, it defaults to this.
2160  cfl->GetValue("dim", &dim_);
2161  if (dim_ <= 0 || offsets_.Dim() % dim_ != 0)
2162  KALDI_ERR << "Invalid dimension dim=" << dim_;
2163  } else {
2164  if(!cfl->GetValue("dim", &dim_))
2165  KALDI_ERR << "'dim' not provided in the config line.";
2166  if (dim_ <= 0)
2167  KALDI_ERR << "Invalid dimension dim=" << dim_;
2168  BaseFloat param_mean = 0.0, param_stddev = 0.0;
2169  cfl->GetValue("param-mean", &param_mean);
2170  cfl->GetValue("param-stddev", &param_stddev);
2171  int32 block_dim = dim_;
2172  cfl->GetValue("block-dim", &block_dim);
2173  if (block_dim <= 0 || dim_ % block_dim != 0)
2174  KALDI_ERR << "Invalid value block-dim=" << block_dim;
2175  offsets_.Resize(block_dim);
2176  offsets_.SetRandn();
2177  offsets_.Scale(param_stddev);
2178  offsets_.Add(param_mean);
2179  }
2180  use_natural_gradient_ = true;
2181  cfl->GetValue("use-natural-gradient", &use_natural_gradient_);
2182  if (cfl->HasUnusedValues())
2183  KALDI_ERR << "Could not process these elements in initializer: "
2184  << cfl->UnusedValues();
2185  // For now you can't modify these defaults of the natural gradient.
2186  // This code must be kept in sync with the code in Read().
2187  preconditioner_.SetRank(20);
2188  preconditioner_.SetUpdatePeriod(4);
2189 }
2190 
2191 void* PerElementOffsetComponent::Propagate(
2192  const ComponentPrecomputedIndexes *indexes,
2193  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in,
2194  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *out) const {
2195  if (in.Data() != out->Data())
2196  out->CopyFromMat(in);
2197  if (dim_ == offsets_.Dim()) {
2198  out->AddVecToRows(1.0, offsets_);
2199  } else {
2200  KALDI_ASSERT(out->Stride() == out->NumCols());
2201  int32 block_dim = offsets_.Dim(), multiple = dim_ / block_dim,
2202  num_rows = out->NumRows() * multiple;
2203  CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat> out_rearranged(out->Data(), num_rows,
2204  block_dim, block_dim);
2205  out_rearranged.AddVecToRows(1.0, offsets_);
2206  }
2207  return NULL;
2208 }
2209 
2210 void PerElementOffsetComponent::Backprop(
2211  const std::string &debug_info,
2212  const ComponentPrecomputedIndexes *indexes,
2213  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &, // in_value
2214  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &, // out_value
2215  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_deriv,
2216  void *memo,
2217  Component *to_update_in,
2218  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *in_deriv) const {
2219  PerElementOffsetComponent *to_update =
2220  dynamic_cast<PerElementOffsetComponent*>(to_update_in);
2221 
2222  if (in_deriv && in_deriv->Data() != out_deriv.Data()) {
2223  // Propagate the derivative back to the input.
2224  in_deriv->CopyFromMat(out_deriv);
2225  }
2226 
2227  if (to_update != NULL) {
2228  // we may have to reshape out_deriv, if "block-dim" was set
2229  // in the config file when initializing the object, leading
2230  // to dim_ being a multiple >1 of offset_.Dim().
2231  // To avoid having separate code paths we create a sub-matrix
2232  // in any case, but this may just be a copy of out_deriv.
2233  int32 block_dim = offsets_.Dim(), multiple = dim_ / block_dim,
2234  block_stride = (multiple == 1 ? out_deriv.Stride() : block_dim),
2235  num_rows = out_deriv.NumRows() * multiple;
2236  KALDI_ASSERT(multiple == 1 || out_deriv.Stride() == out_deriv.NumCols());
2237  CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat> out_deriv_reshaped(out_deriv.Data(), num_rows,
2238  block_dim, block_stride);
2239  if (!to_update->use_natural_gradient_ || to_update->is_gradient_) {
2240  KALDI_LOG << "Using non-NG update, lr = " << to_update->learning_rate_;
2241  to_update->offsets_.AddRowSumMat(to_update->learning_rate_,
2242  out_deriv_reshaped);
2243  } else {
2244  KALDI_LOG << "Using NG update, lr = " << to_update->learning_rate_;
2245  // make a copy as we don't want to modify the data of 'out_deriv', which
2246  // was const (even though CuSubMatrix does not respect const-ness in
2247  // this scenario)
2248  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> out_deriv_copy(out_deriv_reshaped);
2249  BaseFloat scale = 1.0;
2250  to_update->preconditioner_.PreconditionDirections(&out_deriv_copy,
2251  &scale);
2252  to_update->offsets_.AddRowSumMat(scale * to_update->learning_rate_,
2253  out_deriv_copy);
2254  }
2255  }
2256 }
2257 
2258 void PerElementOffsetComponent::Read(std::istream &is, bool binary) {
2259  ReadUpdatableCommon(is, binary); // Read opening tag and learning rate
2260  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<Offsets>");
2261  offsets_.Read(is, binary);
2262  if (PeekToken(is, binary) == 'I') {
2263  // for back compatibility; we don't write this here any
2264  // more as it's written and read in Write/ReadUpdatableCommon
2265  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<IsGradient>");
2266  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &is_gradient_);
2267  }
2268  if (PeekToken(is, binary) != '/') {
2269  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<Dim>");
2270  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &dim_);
2271  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<UseNaturalGradient>");
2272  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &use_natural_gradient_);
2273  } else {
2274  dim_ = offsets_.Dim();
2275  use_natural_gradient_ = true;
2276  }
2277  // For now you can't modify these defaults of the natural gradient.
2278  // This code must be kept in sync with the code in InitFromConfig().
2279  preconditioner_.SetRank(20);
2280  preconditioner_.SetUpdatePeriod(4);
2281  ExpectToken(is, binary, "</PerElementOffsetComponent>");
2282 }
2283 
2284 void PerElementOffsetComponent::Write(std::ostream &os, bool binary) const {
2285  WriteUpdatableCommon(os, binary); // Write opening tag and learning rate
2286  WriteToken(os, binary, "<Offsets>");
2287  offsets_.Write(os, binary);
2288  WriteToken(os, binary, "<Dim>");
2289  WriteBasicType(os, binary, dim_);
2290  WriteToken(os, binary, "<UseNaturalGradient>");
2291  WriteBasicType(os, binary, use_natural_gradient_);
2292  WriteToken(os, binary, "</PerElementOffsetComponent>");
2293 }
2294 
2295 int32 PerElementOffsetComponent::NumParameters() const {
2296  return offsets_.Dim();
2297 }
2298 
2299 void PerElementOffsetComponent::Vectorize(VectorBase<BaseFloat> *params) const {
2300  params->CopyFromVec(offsets_);
2301 }
2302 
2303 void PerElementOffsetComponent::UnVectorize(
2304  const VectorBase<BaseFloat> &params) {
2305  offsets_.CopyFromVec(params);
2306 }
2307 
2308 std::string ScaleAndOffsetComponent::Info() const {
2309  std::ostringstream stream;
2310  stream << UpdatableComponent::Info()
2311  << ", rank=" << scale_preconditioner_.GetRank();
2312  if (dim_ != scales_.Dim())
2313  stream << ", block-size=" << scales_.Dim();
2314  PrintParameterStats(stream, "scales", scales_, true);
2315  PrintParameterStats(stream, "offsets", offsets_, true);
2316  return stream.str();
2317 }
2318 
2319 void ScaleAndOffsetComponent::InitFromConfig(ConfigLine *cfl) {
2320 
2321  InitLearningRatesFromConfig(cfl);
2322  if (!cfl->GetValue("dim", &dim_) || dim_ <= 0) {
2323  KALDI_ERR << "Dimension 'dim' must be specified and >0: "
2324  << cfl->WholeLine();
2325  }
2326  use_natural_gradient_ = true;
2327  cfl->GetValue("use-natural-gradient", &use_natural_gradient_);
2328  int32 block_dim = dim_,
2329  rank = 20;
2330  cfl->GetValue("block-dim", &block_dim);
2331  if (block_dim <= 0 || dim_ % block_dim != 0) {
2332  KALDI_ERR << "Invalid block-dim: " << cfl->WholeLine();
2333  }
2334  cfl->GetValue("rank", &rank);
2335  scales_.Resize(block_dim);
2336  scales_.Set(1.0);
2337  offsets_.Resize(block_dim);
2338  // offsets are all zero when initialized.
2339  if (cfl->HasUnusedValues())
2340  KALDI_ERR << "Could not process these elements in initializer: "
2341  << cfl->UnusedValues();
2342  offset_preconditioner_.SetRank(rank);
2343  scale_preconditioner_.SetRank(rank);
2344  // the update period can't be configured for now; we'll add an option if we
2345  // want to.
2346  offset_preconditioner_.SetUpdatePeriod(4);
2347  scale_preconditioner_.SetUpdatePeriod(4);
2348 }
2349 
2350 void ScaleAndOffsetComponent::Read(std::istream &is, bool binary) {
2351  ReadUpdatableCommon(is, binary); // Read opening tag and learning rate
2352  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<Dim>");
2353  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &dim_);
2354  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<Scales>");
2355  scales_.Read(is, binary);
2356  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<Offsets>");
2357  offsets_.Read(is, binary);
2358  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<UseNaturalGradient>");
2359  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &use_natural_gradient_);
2360  int32 rank;
2361  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<Rank>");
2362  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &rank);
2363  scale_preconditioner_.SetRank(rank);
2364  offset_preconditioner_.SetRank(rank);
2365  ExpectToken(is, binary, "</ScaleAndOffsetComponent>");
2366 }
2367 
2368 void ScaleAndOffsetComponent::Write(std::ostream &os, bool binary) const {
2369  WriteUpdatableCommon(os, binary); // Write opening tag and learning rate
2370  WriteToken(os, binary, "<Dim>");
2371  WriteBasicType(os, binary, dim_);
2372  WriteToken(os, binary, "<Scales>");
2373  scales_.Write(os, binary);
2374  WriteToken(os, binary, "<Offsets>");
2375  offsets_.Write(os, binary);
2376  WriteToken(os, binary, "<UseNaturalGradient>");
2377  WriteBasicType(os, binary, use_natural_gradient_);
2378  WriteToken(os, binary, "<Rank>");
2379  WriteBasicType(os, binary, scale_preconditioner_.GetRank());
2380  WriteToken(os, binary, "</ScaleAndOffsetComponent>");
2381 }
2382 
2383 void ScaleAndOffsetComponent::Scale(BaseFloat scale) {
2384  if (scale == 0.0) {
2385  scales_.SetZero();
2386  offsets_.SetZero();
2387  } else {
2388  scales_.Scale(scale);
2389  offsets_.Scale(scale);
2390  }
2391 }
2392 
2393 void ScaleAndOffsetComponent::Add(BaseFloat alpha,
2394  const Component &other_in) {
2395  const ScaleAndOffsetComponent *other =
2396  dynamic_cast<const ScaleAndOffsetComponent*>(&other_in);
2397  KALDI_ASSERT(other != NULL);
2398  scales_.AddVec(alpha, other->scales_);
2399  offsets_.AddVec(alpha, other->offsets_);
2400 }
2401 
2402 ScaleAndOffsetComponent::ScaleAndOffsetComponent(
2403  const ScaleAndOffsetComponent &component):
2404  UpdatableComponent(component),
2405  dim_(component.dim_),
2406  scales_(component.scales_),
2407  offsets_(component.offsets_),
2408  use_natural_gradient_(component.use_natural_gradient_),
2409  scale_preconditioner_(component.scale_preconditioner_),
2410  offset_preconditioner_(component.offset_preconditioner_) { }
2411 
2412 void ScaleAndOffsetComponent::PerturbParams(BaseFloat stddev) {
2413  CuVector<BaseFloat> temp(scales_.Dim(), kUndefined);
2414  temp.SetRandn();
2415  scales_.AddVec(stddev, temp);
2416  temp.SetRandn();
2417  offsets_.AddVec(stddev, temp);
2418 }
2419 
2420 BaseFloat ScaleAndOffsetComponent::DotProduct(
2421  const UpdatableComponent &other_in) const {
2422  const ScaleAndOffsetComponent *other =
2423  dynamic_cast<const ScaleAndOffsetComponent*>(&other_in);
2424  return VecVec(other->scales_, scales_) + VecVec(other->offsets_, offsets_);
2425 }
2426 
2427 void ScaleAndOffsetComponent::Vectorize(VectorBase<BaseFloat> *params) const {
2428  int32 dim = scales_.Dim();
2429  params->Range(0, dim).CopyFromVec(scales_);
2430  params->Range(dim, dim).CopyFromVec(offsets_);
2431 }
2432 
2433 void ScaleAndOffsetComponent::UnVectorize(
2434  const VectorBase<BaseFloat> &params) {
2435  int32 dim = scales_.Dim();
2436  scales_.CopyFromVec(params.Range(0, dim));
2437  offsets_.CopyFromVec(params.Range(dim, dim));
2438 }
2439 
2440 void* ScaleAndOffsetComponent::Propagate(
2441  const ComponentPrecomputedIndexes *indexes,
2442  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in,
2443  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *out) const {
2444  if (dim_ == scales_.Dim()) {
2445  PropagateInternal(in, out);
2446  } else {
2447  int32 multiple = dim_ / scales_.Dim(),
2448  num_rows = in.NumRows(), block_dim = scales_.Dim();
2449  KALDI_ASSERT(in.NumCols() == in.Stride() &&
2450  SameDimAndStride(in, *out));
2451  // Reinterpret the data as matrices with more rows but fewer columns.
2452  CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat> in_rearranged(in.Data(), num_rows * multiple,
2453  block_dim, block_dim),
2454  out_rearranged(out->Data(), num_rows * multiple,
2455  block_dim, block_dim);
2456  PropagateInternal(in_rearranged, &out_rearranged);
2457  }
2458  return NULL;
2459 }
2460 
2461 void ScaleAndOffsetComponent::PropagateInternal(
2462  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in,
2463  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *out) const {
2464  if (out->Data() != in.Data())
2465  out->CopyFromMat(in);
2466  BaseFloat epsilon = Epsilon();
2467  int32 dim = scales_.Dim();
2468  CuVector<BaseFloat> scales_nonzero(dim, kUndefined);
2469  cu::EnsureNonzero(scales_, epsilon, &scales_nonzero);
2470  out->MulColsVec(scales_nonzero);
2471  out->AddVecToRows(1.0, offsets_);
2472 }
2473 
2474 void ScaleAndOffsetComponent::Backprop(
2475  const std::string &debug_info,
2476  const ComponentPrecomputedIndexes *indexes,
2477  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &, // in_value
2478  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_value,
2479  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_deriv,
2480  void *memo,
2481  Component *to_update_in,
2482  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *in_deriv) const {
2483  ScaleAndOffsetComponent *to_update =
2484  dynamic_cast<ScaleAndOffsetComponent*>(to_update_in);
2485 
2486  KALDI_ASSERT(SameDim(out_value, out_deriv));
2487 
2488  if (dim_ == scales_.Dim()) {
2489  BackpropInternal(debug_info, out_value, out_deriv,
2490  to_update, in_deriv);
2491  } else {
2492  KALDI_ASSERT(out_value.NumCols() == out_value.Stride() &&
2493  SameDimAndStride(out_value, out_deriv) &&
2494  (!in_deriv || SameDimAndStride(out_value, *in_deriv)));
2495  int32 multiple = dim_ / scales_.Dim(),
2496  num_rows = out_value.NumRows(),
2497  block_dim = scales_.Dim();
2498  CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat> out_value_rearranged(out_value.Data(),
2499  num_rows * multiple,
2500  block_dim, block_dim),
2501  out_deriv_rearranged(out_deriv.Data(), num_rows * multiple,
2502  block_dim, block_dim);
2503  if (in_deriv) {
2504  CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat> in_deriv_rearranged(in_deriv->Data(),
2505  num_rows * multiple,
2506  block_dim, block_dim);
2507  BackpropInternal(debug_info, out_value_rearranged,
2508  out_deriv_rearranged, to_update,
2509  &in_deriv_rearranged);
2510  } else {
2511  BackpropInternal(debug_info, out_value_rearranged,
2512  out_deriv_rearranged, to_update,
2513  NULL);
2514  }
2515  }
2516 }
2517 
2518 
2519  // Internal version of backprop, where the num-cols of the
2520  // argument matrices are equal to scales_.Dim().
2521 void ScaleAndOffsetComponent::BackpropInternal(
2522  const std::string &debug_info,
2523  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_value,
2524  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_deriv,
2525  ScaleAndOffsetComponent *to_update,
2526  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *in_deriv) const {
2527  if (to_update) {
2528  if (!to_update->use_natural_gradient_ || to_update->is_gradient_) {
2529  to_update->offsets_.AddRowSumMat(to_update->learning_rate_,
2530  out_deriv);
2531  } else {
2532  BaseFloat scale = 1.0;
2533  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> out_deriv_copy(out_deriv);
2534  to_update->offset_preconditioner_.PreconditionDirections(
2535  &out_deriv_copy, &scale);
2536  to_update->offsets_.AddRowSumMat(scale * to_update->learning_rate_,
2537  out_deriv_copy);
2538  }
2539  // The backprop actually needs the input to the component, not the output;
2540  // but we make the output available because in the common topologies that
2541  // will already be required for backprop-- it's for memory efficiency.
2542  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> in_value_reconstructed(out_value);
2543  int32 dim = scales_.Dim();
2544  CuVector<BaseFloat> scales_nonzero(dim, kUndefined);
2545  BaseFloat epsilon = Epsilon();
2546  cu::EnsureNonzero(scales_, epsilon, &scales_nonzero);
2547  scales_nonzero.InvertElements();
2548  in_value_reconstructed.AddVecToRows(-1.0, offsets_);
2549  // Actually scales_nonzero are now the inverses of the scales.
2550  in_value_reconstructed.MulColsVec(scales_nonzero);
2551  // OK, at this point in_value_reconstructed is the input to the component.
2552  // Multiply its elements by 'out_deriv' to get the derivatives
2553  // (for each frame) w.r.t. the scales.
2554  in_value_reconstructed.MulElements(out_deriv);
2555  BaseFloat scale = 1.0;
2556  if (to_update->use_natural_gradient_ && !to_update->is_gradient_) {
2557  to_update->scale_preconditioner_.PreconditionDirections(
2558  &in_value_reconstructed, &scale);
2559  }
2560  to_update->scales_.AddRowSumMat(scale * to_update->learning_rate_,
2561  in_value_reconstructed);
2562  }
2563  if (in_deriv) {
2564  if (in_deriv->Data() != out_deriv.Data())
2565  in_deriv->CopyFromMat(out_deriv);
2566  in_deriv->MulColsVec(scales_);
2567  }
2568 }
2569 
2570 void ScaleAndOffsetComponent::ConsolidateMemory() {
2571  OnlineNaturalGradient temp_scale(scale_preconditioner_);
2572  scale_preconditioner_.Swap(&temp_scale);
2573  OnlineNaturalGradient temp_offset(offset_preconditioner_);
2574  offset_preconditioner_.Swap(&temp_offset);
2575 }
2576 
2577 
2578 std::string ConstantFunctionComponent::Info() const {
2579  std::ostringstream stream;
2580  stream << UpdatableComponent::Info()
2581  << ", " << Type() << ", input-dim=" << InputDim()
2582  << ", output-dim=" << OutputDim()
2583  << ", is-updatable=" << std::boolalpha << is_updatable_
2584  << ", use-natural-gradient=" << std::boolalpha
2585  << use_natural_gradient_;
2586  PrintParameterStats(stream, "output", output_, true);
2587  return stream.str();
2588 }
2589 
2590 ConstantFunctionComponent::ConstantFunctionComponent():
2591  UpdatableComponent(), input_dim_(-1), is_updatable_(true),
2592  use_natural_gradient_(true) { }
2593 
2594 ConstantFunctionComponent::ConstantFunctionComponent(
2595  const ConstantFunctionComponent &other):
2596  UpdatableComponent(other), input_dim_(other.input_dim_),
2597  output_(other.output_), is_updatable_(other.is_updatable_),
2598  use_natural_gradient_(other.use_natural_gradient_),
2599  preconditioner_(other.preconditioner_) { }
2600 
2601 void* ConstantFunctionComponent::Propagate(
2602  const ComponentPrecomputedIndexes *indexes,
2603  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in,
2604  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *out) const {
2605  out->CopyRowsFromVec(output_);
2606  return NULL;
2607 }
2608 
2609 void ConstantFunctionComponent::Backprop(
2610  const std::string &debug_info,
2611  const ComponentPrecomputedIndexes *indexes,
2612  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &, // in_value
2613  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &, // out_value
2614  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_deriv,
2615  void *memo,
2616  Component *to_update_in,
2617  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *in_deriv) const {
2618  // we don't update in_deriv, since we set the flag
2619  // kBackpropAdds, and the output doesn't depend on the
2620  // input, so the input-derivative is zero.
2621  if (to_update_in) {
2622  ConstantFunctionComponent *to_update =
2623  dynamic_cast<ConstantFunctionComponent*>(to_update_in);
2624  if (to_update->is_updatable_) {
2625  // only do the update if the is_updatable_ flag is set.
2626  KALDI_ASSERT(to_update && to_update->is_updatable_);
2627  if (to_update->use_natural_gradient_ && !to_update->is_gradient_) {
2628  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> out_deriv_copy(out_deriv);
2629  BaseFloat scale = 1.0;
2630  to_update->preconditioner_.PreconditionDirections(&out_deriv_copy,
2631  &scale);
2632  to_update->output_.AddRowSumMat(scale * to_update->learning_rate_,
2633  out_deriv_copy);
2634  } else {
2635  to_update->output_.AddRowSumMat(to_update->learning_rate_,
2636  out_deriv);
2637  }
2638  }
2639  }
2640 }
2641 
2642 void ConstantFunctionComponent::Read(std::istream &is, bool binary) {
2643  std::string token;
2644  ReadToken(is, binary, &token);
2645  if (token == "<ConstantFunctionComponent>") {
2646  ReadToken(is, binary, &token);
2647  }
2648  if (token == "<LearningRateFactor>") {
2649  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &learning_rate_factor_);
2650  ReadToken(is, binary, &token);
2651  } else {
2652  learning_rate_factor_ = 1.0;
2653  }
2654  if (token == "<IsGradient>") {
2655  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &is_gradient_);
2656  ReadToken(is, binary, &token);
2657  } else {
2658  is_gradient_ = false;
2659  }
2660  if (token == "<LearningRate>") {
2661  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &learning_rate_);
2662  ReadToken(is, binary, &token);
2663  } else {
2664  learning_rate_ = 0.001;
2665  }
2666  if (token == "<InputDim>") {
2667  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &input_dim_);
2668  } else {
2669  KALDI_ERR << "Expected token <InputDim>, got "
2670  << token;
2671  }
2672  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<Output>");
2673  output_.Read(is, binary);
2674  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<IsUpdatable>");
2675  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &is_updatable_);
2676  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<UseNaturalGradient>");
2677  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &use_natural_gradient_);
2678  ExpectToken(is, binary, "</ConstantFunctionComponent>");
2679 }
2680 
2681 void ConstantFunctionComponent::Write(std::ostream &os, bool binary) const {
2682  WriteUpdatableCommon(os, binary); // Write the opening tag and learning rate
2683  WriteToken(os, binary, "<InputDim>");
2684  WriteBasicType(os, binary, input_dim_);
2685  WriteToken(os, binary, "<Output>");
2686  output_.Write(os, binary);
2687  WriteToken(os, binary, "<IsUpdatable>");
2688  WriteBasicType(os, binary, is_updatable_);
2689  WriteToken(os, binary, "<UseNaturalGradient>");
2690  WriteBasicType(os, binary, use_natural_gradient_);
2691  WriteToken(os, binary, "</ConstantFunctionComponent>");
2692 }
2693 
2694 Component* ConstantFunctionComponent::Copy() const {
2695  return new ConstantFunctionComponent(*this);
2696 }
2697 
2698 void ConstantFunctionComponent::Scale(BaseFloat scale) {
2699  if (is_updatable_) {
2700  if (scale == 0.0) {
2701  output_.SetZero();
2702  } else {
2703  output_.Scale(scale);
2704  }
2705  }
2706 }
2707 
2708 void ConstantFunctionComponent::Add(BaseFloat alpha, const Component &other_in) {
2709  if (is_updatable_) {
2710  const ConstantFunctionComponent *other =
2711  dynamic_cast<const ConstantFunctionComponent*>(&other_in);
2712  KALDI_ASSERT(other != NULL);
2713  output_.AddVec(alpha, other->output_);
2714  }
2715 }
2716 
2717 void ConstantFunctionComponent::PerturbParams(BaseFloat stddev) {
2718  CuVector<BaseFloat> temp_output(output_.Dim(), kUndefined);
2719  temp_output.SetRandn();
2720  output_.AddVec(stddev, temp_output);
2721 }
2722 
2723 BaseFloat ConstantFunctionComponent::DotProduct(
2724  const UpdatableComponent &other_in) const {
2725  KALDI_ASSERT(is_updatable_);
2726  const ConstantFunctionComponent *other =
2727  dynamic_cast<const ConstantFunctionComponent*>(&other_in);
2728  KALDI_ASSERT(other != NULL);
2729  return VecVec(output_, other->output_);
2730 }
2731 
2732 void ConstantFunctionComponent::InitFromConfig(ConfigLine *cfl) {
2733  int32 output_dim = 0;
2734  InitLearningRatesFromConfig(cfl);
2735  bool ok = cfl->GetValue("output-dim", &output_dim) &&
2736  cfl->GetValue("input-dim", &input_dim_);
2737  cfl->GetValue("is-updatable", &is_updatable_);
2738  cfl->GetValue("use-natural-gradient", &use_natural_gradient_);
2739  BaseFloat output_mean = 0.0, output_stddev = 0.0;
2740  cfl->GetValue("output-mean", &output_mean);
2741  cfl->GetValue("output-stddev", &output_stddev);
2742  if (!ok || cfl->HasUnusedValues() || input_dim_ <= 0 ||
2743  output_dim <= 0) {
2744  KALDI_ERR << "Bad initializer " << cfl->WholeLine();
2745  }
2746  Vector<BaseFloat> output(output_dim);
2747  output.SetRandn();
2748  output.Scale(output_stddev);
2749  output.Add(output_mean);
2750  output_ = output;
2751 }
2752 
2753 int32 ConstantFunctionComponent::NumParameters() const {
2754  KALDI_ASSERT(is_updatable_);
2755  return output_.Dim();
2756 }
2757 
2758 void ConstantFunctionComponent::Vectorize(VectorBase<BaseFloat> *params) const {
2759  params->CopyFromVec(output_);
2760 }
2761 
2762 void ConstantFunctionComponent::UnVectorize(const VectorBase<BaseFloat> &params) {
2763  output_.CopyFromVec(params);
2764 }
2765 
2766 void ConstantFunctionComponent::ConsolidateMemory() {
2767  OnlineNaturalGradient temp(preconditioner_);
2768  preconditioner_.Swap(&temp);
2769 }
2770 
2771 void NaturalGradientAffineComponent::Read(std::istream &is, bool binary) {
2772  ReadUpdatableCommon(is, binary); // Read the opening tag and learning rate
2773  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<LinearParams>");
2774  linear_params_.Read(is, binary);
2775  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<BiasParams>");
2776  bias_params_.Read(is, binary);
2777 
2778  BaseFloat num_samples_history, alpha;
2779  int32 rank_in, rank_out, update_period;
2780 
2781  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<RankIn>");
2782  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &rank_in);
2783  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<RankOut>");
2784  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &rank_out);
2785  if (PeekToken(is, binary) == 'O') {
2786  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<OrthonormalConstraint>");
2787  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &orthonormal_constraint_);
2788  } else {
2789  orthonormal_constraint_ = 0.0;
2790  }
2791  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<UpdatePeriod>");
2792  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &update_period);
2793  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<NumSamplesHistory>");
2794  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &num_samples_history);
2795  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<Alpha>");
2796  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &alpha);
2797 
2798  preconditioner_in_.SetNumSamplesHistory(num_samples_history);
2799  preconditioner_out_.SetNumSamplesHistory(num_samples_history);
2800  preconditioner_in_.SetAlpha(alpha);
2801  preconditioner_out_.SetAlpha(alpha);
2802  preconditioner_in_.SetRank(rank_in);
2803  preconditioner_out_.SetRank(rank_out);
2804  preconditioner_in_.SetUpdatePeriod(update_period);
2805  preconditioner_out_.SetUpdatePeriod(update_period);
2806 
2807  if (PeekToken(is, binary) == 'M') {
2808  // MaxChangePerSample, long ago removed; back compatibility.
2809  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<MaxChangePerSample>");
2810  BaseFloat temp;
2811  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &temp);
2812  }
2813  if (PeekToken(is, binary) == 'I') {
2814  // for back compatibility; we don't write this here any
2815  // more as it's written and read in Write/ReadUpdatableCommon
2816  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<IsGradient>");
2817  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &is_gradient_);
2818  }
2819  if (PeekToken(is, binary) == 'U') {
2820  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<UpdateCount>");
2821  // back-compatibility branch (these configs were added and then removed).
2822  double temp;
2823  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &temp);
2824  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<ActiveScalingCount>");
2825  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &temp);
2826  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<MaxChangeScaleStats>");
2827  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &temp);
2828  }
2829  std::string token;
2830  ReadToken(is, binary, &token);
2831  // the following has to handle a couple variants of
2832  if (token.find("NaturalGradientAffineComponent>") == std::string::npos)
2833  KALDI_ERR << "Expected <NaturalGradientAffineComponent> or "
2834  << "</NaturalGradientAffineComponent>, got " << token;
2835 }
2836 
2837 
2838 NaturalGradientAffineComponent::NaturalGradientAffineComponent(
2839  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &linear_params,
2840  const CuVectorBase<BaseFloat> &bias_params):
2841  AffineComponent(linear_params, bias_params, 0.001) {
2842  KALDI_ASSERT(bias_params.Dim() == linear_params.NumRows() &&
2843  bias_params.Dim() != 0);
2844 
2845  // set some default natural gradient configs.
2846  preconditioner_in_.SetRank(20);
2847  preconditioner_out_.SetRank(80);
2848  preconditioner_in_.SetUpdatePeriod(4);
2849  preconditioner_out_.SetUpdatePeriod(4);
2850 }
2851 
2852 void NaturalGradientAffineComponent::InitFromConfig(ConfigLine *cfl) {
2853  bool ok = true;
2854  std::string matrix_filename;
2855 
2856  is_gradient_ = false; // not configurable; there's no reason you'd want this
2857 
2858  InitLearningRatesFromConfig(cfl);
2859 
2860  if (cfl->GetValue("matrix", &matrix_filename)) {
2861  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> mat;
2862  ReadKaldiObject(matrix_filename, &mat); // will abort on failure.
2863  KALDI_ASSERT(mat.NumCols() >= 2);
2864  int32 input_dim = mat.NumCols() - 1, output_dim = mat.NumRows();
2865  linear_params_.Resize(output_dim, input_dim);
2866  bias_params_.Resize(output_dim);
2867  linear_params_.CopyFromMat(mat.Range(0, output_dim, 0, input_dim));
2868  bias_params_.CopyColFromMat(mat, input_dim);
2869  if (cfl->GetValue("input-dim", &input_dim))
2870  KALDI_ASSERT(input_dim == InputDim() &&
2871  "input-dim mismatch vs. matrix.");
2872  if (cfl->GetValue("output-dim", &output_dim))
2873  KALDI_ASSERT(output_dim == OutputDim() &&
2874  "output-dim mismatch vs. matrix.");
2875  } else {
2876  int32 input_dim = -1, output_dim = -1;
2877 
2878  ok = ok && cfl->GetValue("input-dim", &input_dim);
2879  ok = ok && cfl->GetValue("output-dim", &output_dim);
2880  if (!ok)
2881  KALDI_ERR << "Bad initializer " << cfl->WholeLine();
2882  BaseFloat param_stddev = 1.0 / std::sqrt(input_dim),
2883  bias_stddev = 1.0, bias_mean = 0.0;
2884  cfl->GetValue("param-stddev", &param_stddev);
2885  cfl->GetValue("bias-stddev", &bias_stddev);
2886  cfl->GetValue("bias-mean", &bias_mean);
2887  linear_params_.Resize(output_dim, input_dim);
2888  bias_params_.Resize(output_dim);
2889  KALDI_ASSERT(output_dim > 0 && input_dim > 0 && param_stddev >= 0.0 &&
2890  bias_stddev >= 0.0);
2891  linear_params_.SetRandn(); // sets to random normally distributed noise.
2892  linear_params_.Scale(param_stddev);
2893  bias_params_.SetRandn();
2894  bias_params_.Scale(bias_stddev);
2895  bias_params_.Add(bias_mean);
2896  }
2897 
2898  orthonormal_constraint_ = 0.0;
2899  cfl->GetValue("orthonormal-constraint", &orthonormal_constraint_);
2900 
2901  // Set natural-gradient configs.
2902  BaseFloat num_samples_history = 2000.0,
2903  alpha = 4.0;
2904  int32 rank_in = -1, rank_out = -1,
2905  update_period = 4;
2906  cfl->GetValue("num-samples-history", &num_samples_history);
2907  cfl->GetValue("alpha", &alpha);
2908  cfl->GetValue("rank-in", &rank_in);
2909  cfl->GetValue("rank-out", &rank_out);
2910  cfl->GetValue("update-period", &update_period);
2911 
2912  if (rank_in < 0)
2913  rank_in = std::min<int32>(20, (InputDim() + 1) / 2);
2914  if (rank_out < 0)
2915  rank_out = std::min<int32>(80, (OutputDim() + 1) / 2);
2916 
2917  preconditioner_in_.SetNumSamplesHistory(num_samples_history);
2918  preconditioner_out_.SetNumSamplesHistory(num_samples_history);
2919  preconditioner_in_.SetAlpha(alpha);
2920  preconditioner_out_.SetAlpha(alpha);
2921  preconditioner_in_.SetRank(rank_in);
2922  preconditioner_out_.SetRank(rank_out);
2923  preconditioner_in_.SetUpdatePeriod(update_period);
2924  preconditioner_out_.SetUpdatePeriod(update_period);
2925 
2926  if (cfl->HasUnusedValues())
2927  KALDI_ERR << "Could not process these elements in initializer: "
2928  << cfl->UnusedValues();
2929  if (!ok)
2930  KALDI_ERR << "Bad initializer " << cfl->WholeLine();
2931 }
2932 
2933 void NaturalGradientAffineComponent::Write(std::ostream &os,
2934  bool binary) const {
2935  WriteUpdatableCommon(os, binary); // Write the opening tag and learning rate
2936  WriteToken(os, binary, "<LinearParams>");
2937  linear_params_.Write(os, binary);
2938  WriteToken(os, binary, "<BiasParams>");
2939  bias_params_.Write(os, binary);
2940  WriteToken(os, binary, "<RankIn>");
2941  WriteBasicType(os, binary, preconditioner_in_.GetRank());
2942  WriteToken(os, binary, "<RankOut>");
2943  WriteBasicType(os, binary, preconditioner_out_.GetRank());
2944  if (orthonormal_constraint_ != 0.0) {
2945  WriteToken(os, binary, "<OrthonormalConstraint>");
2946  WriteBasicType(os, binary, orthonormal_constraint_);
2947  }
2948  WriteToken(os, binary, "<UpdatePeriod>");
2949  WriteBasicType(os, binary, preconditioner_in_.GetUpdatePeriod());
2950  WriteToken(os, binary, "<NumSamplesHistory>");
2951  WriteBasicType(os, binary, preconditioner_in_.GetNumSamplesHistory());
2952  WriteToken(os, binary, "<Alpha>");
2953  WriteBasicType(os, binary, preconditioner_in_.GetAlpha());
2954  WriteToken(os, binary, "</NaturalGradientAffineComponent>");
2955 }
2956 
2957 std::string NaturalGradientAffineComponent::Info() const {
2958  std::ostringstream stream;
2959  stream << AffineComponent::Info();
2960  stream << ", rank-in=" << preconditioner_in_.GetRank()
2961  << ", rank-out=" << preconditioner_out_.GetRank()
2962  << ", num-samples-history=" << preconditioner_in_.GetNumSamplesHistory()
2963  << ", update-period=" << preconditioner_in_.GetUpdatePeriod()
2964  << ", alpha=" << preconditioner_in_.GetAlpha();
2965  return stream.str();
2966 }
2967 
2968 Component* NaturalGradientAffineComponent::Copy() const {
2969  return new NaturalGradientAffineComponent(*this);
2970 }
2971 
2972 NaturalGradientAffineComponent::NaturalGradientAffineComponent(
2973  const NaturalGradientAffineComponent &other):
2974  AffineComponent(other),
2975  preconditioner_in_(other.preconditioner_in_),
2976  preconditioner_out_(other.preconditioner_out_) { }
2977 
2978 void NaturalGradientAffineComponent::Update(
2979  const std::string &debug_info,
2980  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in_value,
2981  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_deriv) {
2982  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> in_value_temp;
2983 
2984  in_value_temp.Resize(in_value.NumRows(),
2985  in_value.NumCols() + 1, kUndefined);
2986  in_value_temp.Range(0, in_value.NumRows(),
2987  0, in_value.NumCols()).CopyFromMat(in_value);
2988 
2989  // Add the 1.0 at the end of each row "in_value_temp"
2990  in_value_temp.Range(0, in_value.NumRows(),
2991  in_value.NumCols(), 1).Set(1.0);
2992 
2993  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> out_deriv_temp(out_deriv);
2994 
2995  // These "scale" values get will get multiplied into the learning rate (faster
2996  // than having the matrices scaled inside the preconditioning code).
2997  BaseFloat in_scale, out_scale;
2998 
2999  preconditioner_in_.PreconditionDirections(&in_value_temp, &in_scale);
3000  preconditioner_out_.PreconditionDirections(&out_deriv_temp, &out_scale);
3001 
3002  // "scale" is a scaling factor coming from the PreconditionDirections calls
3003  // (it's faster to have them output a scaling factor than to have them scale
3004  // their outputs).
3005  BaseFloat scale = in_scale * out_scale;
3006 
3007  CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat> in_value_precon_part(in_value_temp,
3008  0, in_value_temp.NumRows(),
3009  0, in_value_temp.NumCols() - 1);
3010  // this "precon_ones" is what happens to the vector of 1's representing
3011  // offsets, after multiplication by the preconditioner.
3012  CuVector<BaseFloat> precon_ones(in_value_temp.NumRows());
3013 
3014  precon_ones.CopyColFromMat(in_value_temp, in_value_temp.NumCols() - 1);
3015 
3016  BaseFloat local_lrate = scale * learning_rate_;
3017 
3018  bias_params_.AddMatVec(local_lrate, out_deriv_temp, kTrans,
3019  precon_ones, 1.0);
3020  linear_params_.AddMatMat(local_lrate, out_deriv_temp, kTrans,
3021  in_value_precon_part, kNoTrans, 1.0);
3022 }
3023 
3024 void NaturalGradientAffineComponent::Scale(BaseFloat scale) {
3025  if (scale == 0.0) {
3026  linear_params_.SetZero();
3027  bias_params_.SetZero();
3028  } else {
3029  linear_params_.Scale(scale);
3030  bias_params_.Scale(scale);
3031  }
3032 }
3033 
3034 void NaturalGradientAffineComponent::Add(BaseFloat alpha, const Component &other_in) {
3035  const NaturalGradientAffineComponent *other =
3036  dynamic_cast<const NaturalGradientAffineComponent*>(&other_in);
3037  KALDI_ASSERT(other != NULL);
3038  linear_params_.AddMat(alpha, other->linear_params_);
3039  bias_params_.AddVec(alpha, other->bias_params_);
3040 }
3041 
3042 void NaturalGradientAffineComponent::FreezeNaturalGradient(bool freeze) {
3043  preconditioner_in_.Freeze(freeze);
3044  preconditioner_out_.Freeze(freeze);
3045 }
3046 
3047 void NaturalGradientAffineComponent::ConsolidateMemory() {
3048  OnlineNaturalGradient temp_in(preconditioner_in_);
3049  preconditioner_in_.Swap(&temp_in);
3050  OnlineNaturalGradient temp_out(preconditioner_out_);
3051  preconditioner_out_.Swap(&temp_out);
3052 }
3053 
3054 void LinearComponent::Read(std::istream &is, bool binary) {
3055  std::string token = ReadUpdatableCommon(is, binary);
3056  KALDI_ASSERT(token == "");
3057  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<Params>");
3058  params_.Read(is, binary);
3059  if (PeekToken(is, binary) == 'O') {
3060  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<OrthonormalConstraint>");
3061  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &orthonormal_constraint_);
3062  } else {
3063  orthonormal_constraint_ = 0.0;
3064  }
3065  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<UseNaturalGradient>");
3066  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &use_natural_gradient_);
3067 
3068  // Read various natural-gradient-related configs.
3069  int32 rank_in, rank_out, update_period;
3070  BaseFloat alpha, num_samples_history;
3071  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<RankInOut>");
3072  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &rank_in);
3073  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &rank_out);
3074  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<Alpha>");
3075  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &alpha);
3076  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<NumSamplesHistory>");
3077  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &num_samples_history);
3078  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<UpdatePeriod>");
3079  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &update_period);
3080 
3081  preconditioner_in_.SetAlpha(alpha);
3082  preconditioner_out_.SetAlpha(alpha);
3083  preconditioner_in_.SetRank(rank_in);
3084  preconditioner_out_.SetRank(rank_out);
3085  preconditioner_in_.SetNumSamplesHistory(num_samples_history);
3086  preconditioner_out_.SetNumSamplesHistory(num_samples_history);
3087  preconditioner_in_.SetUpdatePeriod(update_period);
3088  preconditioner_out_.SetUpdatePeriod(update_period);
3089 
3090  ExpectToken(is, binary, "</LinearComponent>");
3091 }
3092 
3093 void LinearComponent::InitFromConfig(ConfigLine *cfl) {
3094  bool ok = true;
3095  std::string matrix_filename;
3096  is_gradient_ = false; // not configurable; there's no reason you'd want this
3097 
3098  InitLearningRatesFromConfig(cfl);
3099 
3100  int32 input_dim = -1, output_dim = -1;
3101  if (cfl->GetValue("matrix", &matrix_filename)) {
3102  ReadKaldiObject(matrix_filename, &params_); // will abort on failure.
3103  KALDI_ASSERT(params_.NumRows() != 0);
3104  if (cfl->GetValue("input-dim", &input_dim))
3105  KALDI_ASSERT(input_dim == InputDim() &&
3106  "input-dim mismatch vs. matrix.");
3107  if (cfl->GetValue("output-dim", &output_dim))
3108  KALDI_ASSERT(output_dim == OutputDim() &&
3109  "output-dim mismatch vs. matrix.");
3110  } else {
3111  ok = ok && cfl->GetValue("input-dim", &input_dim);
3112  ok = ok && cfl->GetValue("output-dim", &output_dim);
3113  if (!ok)
3114  KALDI_ERR << "Bad initializer " << cfl->WholeLine();
3115  BaseFloat param_stddev = 1.0 / std::sqrt(input_dim);
3116  cfl->GetValue("param-stddev", &param_stddev);
3117  params_.Resize(output_dim, input_dim);
3118  KALDI_ASSERT(output_dim > 0 && input_dim > 0 && param_stddev >= 0.0);
3119  params_.SetRandn(); // sets to random normally distributed noise.
3120  params_.Scale(param_stddev);
3121  }
3122  // Read various natural-gradient-related configs.
3123  int32 rank_in = -1, rank_out = -1, update_period = 4;
3124  BaseFloat alpha = 4.0,
3125  num_samples_history = 2000.0;
3126 
3127  use_natural_gradient_ = true;
3128 
3129  cfl->GetValue("num-samples-history", &num_samples_history);
3130  cfl->GetValue("alpha", &alpha);
3131  cfl->GetValue("rank-in", &rank_in);
3132  cfl->GetValue("rank-out", &rank_out);
3133  cfl->GetValue("update-period", &update_period);
3134  cfl->GetValue("use-natural-gradient", &use_natural_gradient_);
3135 
3136  if (rank_in < 0)
3137  rank_in = std::min<int32>(20, (InputDim() + 1) / 2);
3138  if (rank_out < 0)
3139  rank_out = std::min<int32>(80, (OutputDim() + 1) / 2);
3140 
3141  preconditioner_in_.SetAlpha(alpha);
3142  preconditioner_out_.SetAlpha(alpha);
3143  preconditioner_in_.SetRank(rank_in);
3144  preconditioner_out_.SetRank(rank_out);
3145  preconditioner_in_.SetNumSamplesHistory(num_samples_history);
3146  preconditioner_out_.SetNumSamplesHistory(num_samples_history);
3147  preconditioner_in_.SetUpdatePeriod(update_period);
3148  preconditioner_out_.SetUpdatePeriod(update_period);
3149 
3150  orthonormal_constraint_ = 0.0;
3151  cfl->GetValue("orthonormal-constraint", &orthonormal_constraint_);
3152 
3153  if (cfl->HasUnusedValues())
3154  KALDI_ERR << "Could not process these elements in initializer: "
3155  << cfl->UnusedValues();
3156 }
3157 
3158 
3159 void LinearComponent::Write(std::ostream &os,
3160  bool binary) const {
3161  WriteUpdatableCommon(os, binary); // Write the opening tag and learning rate
3162  WriteToken(os, binary, "<Params>");
3163  params_.Write(os, binary);
3164  if (orthonormal_constraint_ != 0.0) {
3165  WriteToken(os, binary, "<OrthonormalConstraint>");
3166  WriteBasicType(os, binary, orthonormal_constraint_);
3167  }
3168  WriteToken(os, binary, "<UseNaturalGradient>");
3169  WriteBasicType(os, binary, use_natural_gradient_);
3170 
3171  int32 rank_in = preconditioner_in_.GetRank(),
3172  rank_out = preconditioner_out_.GetRank(),
3173  update_period = preconditioner_in_.GetUpdatePeriod();
3174  BaseFloat alpha = preconditioner_in_.GetAlpha(),
3175  num_samples_history = preconditioner_in_.GetNumSamplesHistory();
3176  WriteToken(os, binary, "<RankInOut>");
3177  WriteBasicType(os, binary, rank_in);
3178  WriteBasicType(os, binary, rank_out);
3179  WriteToken(os, binary, "<Alpha>");
3180  WriteBasicType(os, binary, alpha);
3181  WriteToken(os, binary, "<NumSamplesHistory>");
3182  WriteBasicType(os, binary, num_samples_history);
3183  WriteToken(os, binary, "<UpdatePeriod>");
3184  WriteBasicType(os, binary, update_period);
3185  WriteToken(os, binary, "</LinearComponent>");
3186 }
3187 
3188 std::string LinearComponent::Info() const {
3189  std::ostringstream stream;
3190  stream << UpdatableComponent::Info();
3191  PrintParameterStats(stream, "params", params_,
3192  false, // include_mean
3193  true, // include_row_norms
3194  true, // include_column_norms
3195  GetVerboseLevel() >= 2); // include_singular_values
3196  if (orthonormal_constraint_ != 0.0)
3197  stream << ", orthonormal-constraint=" << orthonormal_constraint_;
3198  stream << ", use-natural-gradient="
3199  << (use_natural_gradient_ ? "true" : "false")
3200  << ", rank-in=" << preconditioner_in_.GetRank()
3201  << ", rank-out=" << preconditioner_out_.GetRank()
3202  << ", num-samples-history="
3203  << preconditioner_in_.GetNumSamplesHistory()
3204  << ", update-period=" << preconditioner_in_.GetUpdatePeriod()
3205  << ", alpha=" << preconditioner_in_.GetAlpha();
3206  return stream.str();
3207 }
3208 
3209 void* LinearComponent::Propagate(const ComponentPrecomputedIndexes *indexes,
3210  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in,
3211  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *out) const {
3212  out->AddMatMat(1.0, in, kNoTrans, params_, kTrans, 1.0);
3213  return NULL;
3214 }
3215 
3216 void LinearComponent::Backprop(const std::string &debug_info,
3217  const ComponentPrecomputedIndexes *indexes,
3218  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in_value,
3219  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &, // out_value
3220  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_deriv,
3221  void *memo,
3222  Component *to_update_in,
3223  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *in_deriv) const {
3224  LinearComponent *to_update = dynamic_cast<LinearComponent*>(to_update_in);
3225 
3226  // Propagate the derivative back to the input. add with coefficient 1.0 since
3227  // property kBackpropAdds is true. If we wanted to add with coefficient 0.0
3228  // we'd need to zero the in_deriv, in case of infinities.
3229  if (in_deriv)
3230  in_deriv->AddMatMat(1.0, out_deriv, kNoTrans, params_, kNoTrans, 1.0);
3231 
3232  if (to_update != NULL) {
3233  if (!to_update->is_gradient_) {
3234  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> in_value_temp(in_value), out_deriv_temp(out_deriv);
3235  // These "scale" values get will get multiplied into the learning rate (faster
3236  // than having the matrices scaled inside the preconditioning code).
3237  BaseFloat in_scale, out_scale;
3238  to_update->preconditioner_in_.PreconditionDirections(&in_value_temp,
3239  &in_scale);
3240  to_update->preconditioner_out_.PreconditionDirections(&out_deriv_temp,
3241  &out_scale);
3242  BaseFloat local_lrate = in_scale * out_scale * to_update->learning_rate_;
3243 
3244  to_update->params_.AddMatMat(local_lrate, out_deriv_temp, kTrans,
3245  in_value_temp, kNoTrans, 1.0);
3246  } else {
3247  to_update->params_.AddMatMat(to_update->learning_rate_,
3248  out_deriv, kTrans,
3249  in_value, kNoTrans, 1.0);
3250  }
3251  }
3252 }
3253 
3254 
3255 Component* LinearComponent::Copy() const {
3256  return new LinearComponent(*this);
3257 }
3258 
3259 LinearComponent::LinearComponent(
3260  const LinearComponent &other):
3261  UpdatableComponent(other),
3262  params_(other.params_),
3263  orthonormal_constraint_(other.orthonormal_constraint_),
3264  use_natural_gradient_(other.use_natural_gradient_),
3265  preconditioner_in_(other.preconditioner_in_),
3266  preconditioner_out_(other.preconditioner_out_) { }
3267 
3268 LinearComponent::LinearComponent(const CuMatrix<BaseFloat> &params):
3269  params_(params),
3270  orthonormal_constraint_(0.0),
3271  use_natural_gradient_(true) {
3272  // Set defaults for natural gradient.
3273  preconditioner_in_.SetRank(40);
3274  preconditioner_out_.SetRank(80);
3275  preconditioner_in_.SetUpdatePeriod(4);
3276  preconditioner_out_.SetUpdatePeriod(4);
3277  // the component-level defaults of alpha and num_samples_history, at 4.0 and
3278  // 2000.0, are the same as in the NaturalGradientOnline code, so there is no
3279  // need to set those here.
3280 }
3281 
3282 void LinearComponent::Scale(BaseFloat scale) {
3283  if (scale == 0.0) params_.SetZero();
3284  else params_.Scale(scale);
3285 }
3286 
3287 void LinearComponent::Add(BaseFloat alpha, const Component &other_in) {
3288  const LinearComponent *other =
3289  dynamic_cast<const LinearComponent*>(&other_in);
3290  KALDI_ASSERT(other != NULL);
3291  params_.AddMat(alpha, other->params_);
3292 }
3293 
3294 void LinearComponent::PerturbParams(BaseFloat stddev) {
3295  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> temp_params(params_);
3296  temp_params.SetRandn();
3297  params_.AddMat(stddev, temp_params);
3298 }
3299 int32 LinearComponent::NumParameters() const {
3300  return params_.NumRows() * params_.NumCols();
3301 }
3302 void LinearComponent::Vectorize(VectorBase<BaseFloat> *params) const {
3303  KALDI_ASSERT(params->Dim() == this->NumParameters());
3304  params->CopyRowsFromMat(params_);
3305 }
3306 void LinearComponent::UnVectorize(const VectorBase<BaseFloat> &params) {
3307  KALDI_ASSERT(params.Dim() == this->NumParameters());
3308  params_.CopyRowsFromVec(params);
3309 }
3310 BaseFloat LinearComponent::DotProduct(const UpdatableComponent &other_in) const {
3311  const LinearComponent *other =
3312  dynamic_cast<const LinearComponent*>(&other_in);
3313  return TraceMatMat(params_, other->params_, kTrans);
3314 }
3315 
3316 void LinearComponent::FreezeNaturalGradient(bool freeze) {
3317  preconditioner_in_.Freeze(freeze);
3318  preconditioner_out_.Freeze(freeze);
3319 }
3320 
3321 void LinearComponent::ConsolidateMemory() {
3322  OnlineNaturalGradient temp_in(preconditioner_in_);
3323  preconditioner_in_.Swap(&temp_in);
3324  OnlineNaturalGradient temp_out(preconditioner_out_);
3325  preconditioner_out_.Swap(&temp_out);
3326 }
3327 
3328 std::string FixedAffineComponent::Info() const {
3329  std::ostringstream stream;
3330  stream << Component::Info();
3331  PrintParameterStats(stream, "linear-params", linear_params_);
3332  PrintParameterStats(stream, "bias", bias_params_, true);
3333  return stream.str();
3334 }
3335 
3336 void FixedAffineComponent::Init(const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &mat) {
3337  KALDI_ASSERT(mat.NumCols() > 1);
3338  linear_params_ = mat.Range(0, mat.NumRows(), 0, mat.NumCols() - 1);
3339  bias_params_.Resize(mat.NumRows());
3340  bias_params_.CopyColFromMat(mat, mat.NumCols() - 1);
3341 }
3342 
3343 void FixedAffineComponent::InitFromConfig(ConfigLine *cfl) {
3344  std::string filename;
3345  // Two forms allowed: "matrix=<rxfilename>", or "input-dim=x output-dim=y"
3346  // (for testing purposes only).
3347  if (cfl->GetValue("matrix", &filename)) {
3348  if (cfl->HasUnusedValues())
3349  KALDI_ERR << "Invalid initializer for layer of type "
3350  << Type() << ": \"" << cfl->WholeLine() << "\"";
3351 
3352  bool binary;
3353  Input ki(filename, &binary);
3354  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> mat;
3355  mat.Read(ki.Stream(), binary);
3356  KALDI_ASSERT(mat.NumRows() != 0);
3357  Init(mat);
3358  } else {
3359  int32 input_dim = -1, output_dim = -1;
3360  if (!cfl->GetValue("input-dim", &input_dim) ||
3361  !cfl->GetValue("output-dim", &output_dim) || cfl->HasUnusedValues()) {
3362  KALDI_ERR << "Invalid initializer for layer of type "
3363  << Type() << ": \"" << cfl->WholeLine() << "\"";
3364  }
3365  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> mat(output_dim, input_dim + 1);
3366  mat.SetRandn();
3367  Init(mat);
3368  }
3369 }
3370 
3371 
3372 FixedAffineComponent::FixedAffineComponent(const AffineComponent &c):
3373  linear_params_(c.LinearParams()),
3374  bias_params_(c.BiasParams()) { }
3375 
3376 void* FixedAffineComponent::Propagate(const ComponentPrecomputedIndexes *indexes,
3377  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in,
3378  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *out) const {
3379  out->CopyRowsFromVec(bias_params_); // Adds the bias term first.
3380  out->AddMatMat(1.0, in, kNoTrans, linear_params_, kTrans, 1.0);
3381  return NULL;
3382 }
3383 
3384 void FixedAffineComponent::Backprop(const std::string &debug_info,
3385  const ComponentPrecomputedIndexes *indexes,
3386  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &, //in_value
3387  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &, //out_value
3388  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_deriv,
3389  void *memo,
3390  Component *, //to_update
3391  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *in_deriv) const {
3392  // kBackpropAdds is true. It's the user's responsibility to zero out
3393  // <in_deriv> if they need it to be so.
3394  if (in_deriv)
3395  in_deriv->AddMatMat(1.0, out_deriv, kNoTrans,
3396  linear_params_, kNoTrans, 1.0);
3397 }
3398 
3399 Component* FixedAffineComponent::Copy() const {
3400  FixedAffineComponent *ans = new FixedAffineComponent();
3401  ans->linear_params_ = linear_params_;
3402  ans->bias_params_ = bias_params_;
3403  return ans;
3404 }
3405 
3406 void FixedAffineComponent::Write(std::ostream &os, bool binary) const {
3407  WriteToken(os, binary, "<FixedAffineComponent>");
3408  WriteToken(os, binary, "<LinearParams>");
3409  linear_params_.Write(os, binary);
3410  WriteToken(os, binary, "<BiasParams>");
3411  bias_params_.Write(os, binary);
3412  WriteToken(os, binary, "</FixedAffineComponent>");
3413 }
3414 
3415 void FixedAffineComponent::Read(std::istream &is, bool binary) {
3416  ExpectOneOrTwoTokens(is, binary, "<FixedAffineComponent>", "<LinearParams>");
3417  linear_params_.Read(is, binary);
3418  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<BiasParams>");
3419  bias_params_.Read(is, binary);
3420  ExpectToken(is, binary, "</FixedAffineComponent>");
3421 }
3422 
3423 void SumGroupComponent::Init(const std::vector<int32> &sizes) {
3424  KALDI_ASSERT(!sizes.empty());
3425  std::vector<Int32Pair> cpu_vec(sizes.size());
3426  std::vector<int32> reverse_cpu_vec;
3427  int32 cur_index = 0;
3428  for (size_t i = 0; i < sizes.size(); i++) {
3429  KALDI_ASSERT(sizes[i] > 0);
3430  cpu_vec[i].first = cur_index;
3431  cpu_vec[i].second = cur_index + sizes[i];
3432  cur_index += sizes[i];
3433  for (int32 j = cpu_vec[i].first; j < cpu_vec[i].second; j++)
3434  reverse_cpu_vec.push_back(i);
3435  }
3436  this->indexes_ = cpu_vec;
3437  this->reverse_indexes_ = reverse_cpu_vec;
3438  this->input_dim_ = cur_index;
3439  this->output_dim_ = sizes.size();
3440 }
3441 
3442 void SumGroupComponent::Init(int32 input_dim, int32 output_dim) {
3443  const int32 num_groups = output_dim;
3444  KALDI_ASSERT(input_dim % num_groups == 0);
3445  const int32 group_size = input_dim / num_groups;
3446 
3447  std::vector<Int32Pair> cpu_vec(num_groups);
3448  std::vector<int32> reverse_cpu_vec;
3449  int32 cur_index = 0;
3450  for (size_t i = 0; i < num_groups; i++) {
3451  cpu_vec[i].first = cur_index;
3452  cpu_vec[i].second = cur_index + group_size;
3453  cur_index += group_size;
3454  for (int32 j = cpu_vec[i].first; j < cpu_vec[i].second; j++)
3455  reverse_cpu_vec.push_back(i);
3456  }
3457  this->indexes_ = cpu_vec;
3458  this->reverse_indexes_ = reverse_cpu_vec;
3459  this->input_dim_ = input_dim;
3460  this->output_dim_ = num_groups;
3461 }
3462 
3463 void SumGroupComponent::InitFromConfig(ConfigLine *cfl) {
3464  std::vector<int32> sizes;
3465  bool has_sizes = cfl->GetValue("sizes", &sizes);
3466  if (has_sizes) {
3467  if (cfl->HasUnusedValues() || sizes.empty())
3468  KALDI_ERR << "Invalid initializer for layer of type "
3469  << Type() << ": \"" << cfl->WholeLine() << "\"";
3470  this->Init(sizes);
3471  } else { // each group has the same size
3472  int32 input_dim = -1, output_dim = -1;
3473  if (!cfl->GetValue("input-dim", &input_dim) ||
3474  !cfl->GetValue("output-dim", &output_dim) || cfl->HasUnusedValues()) {
3475  KALDI_ERR << "Invalid initializer for layer of type "
3476  << Type() << ": \"" << cfl->WholeLine() << "\"";
3477  }
3478  Init(input_dim, output_dim);
3479  }
3480 }
3481 
3482 Component* SumGroupComponent::Copy() const {
3483  SumGroupComponent *ans = new SumGroupComponent();
3484  ans->indexes_ = indexes_;
3485  ans->reverse_indexes_ = reverse_indexes_;
3486  ans->input_dim_ = input_dim_;
3487  ans->output_dim_ = output_dim_;
3488  return ans;
3489 }
3490 
3491 void SumGroupComponent::Read(std::istream &is, bool binary) {
3492  ExpectOneOrTwoTokens(is, binary, "<SumGroupComponent>", "<Sizes>");
3493  std::vector<int32> sizes;
3494  ReadIntegerVector(is, binary, &sizes);
3495 
3496  std::string token;
3497  ReadToken(is, binary, &token);
3498  if (!(token == "<SumGroupComponent>" ||
3499  token == "</SumGroupComponent>")) {
3500  KALDI_ERR << "Expected </SumGroupComponent>, got " << token;
3501  }
3502  this->Init(sizes);
3503 }
3504 
3505 void SumGroupComponent::GetSizes(std::vector<int32> *sizes) const {
3506  std::vector<Int32Pair> indexes;
3507  indexes_.CopyToVec(&indexes);
3508  sizes->resize(indexes.size());
3509  for (size_t i = 0; i < indexes.size(); i++) {
3510  (*sizes)[i] = indexes[i].second - indexes[i].first;
3511  if (i == 0) { KALDI_ASSERT(indexes[i].first == 0); }
3512  else { KALDI_ASSERT(indexes[i].first == indexes[i-1].second); }
3513  KALDI_ASSERT(indexes[i].second > indexes[i].first);
3514  (*sizes)[i] = indexes[i].second - indexes[i].first;
3515  }
3516 }
3517 
3518 void SumGroupComponent::Write(std::ostream &os, bool binary) const {
3519  WriteToken(os, binary, "<SumGroupComponent>");
3520  WriteToken(os, binary, "<Sizes>");
3521  std::vector<int32> sizes;
3522  this->GetSizes(&sizes);
3523  WriteIntegerVector(os, binary, sizes);
3524  WriteToken(os, binary, "</SumGroupComponent>");
3525 }
3526 
3527 void* SumGroupComponent::Propagate(const ComponentPrecomputedIndexes *indexes,
3528  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in,
3529  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *out) const {
3530  out->SumColumnRanges(in, indexes_);
3531  return NULL;
3532 }
3533 
3534 void SumGroupComponent::Backprop(const std::string &debug_info,
3535  const ComponentPrecomputedIndexes *indexes,
3536  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &, // in_value,
3537  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &, // out_value
3538  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_deriv,
3539  void *memo,
3540  Component *to_update_in,
3541  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *in_deriv) const {
3542  in_deriv->CopyCols(out_deriv, reverse_indexes_);
3543 }
3544 
3545 void* SoftmaxComponent::Propagate(const ComponentPrecomputedIndexes *indexes,
3546  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in,
3547  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *out) const {
3548  // Apply softmax function to each row of the output...
3549  // for that row, we do
3550  // x_i = exp(x_i) / sum_j exp(x_j).
3551  out->ApplySoftMaxPerRow(in);
3552 
3553  // This floor on the output helps us deal with
3554  // almost-zeros in a way that doesn't lead to overflow.
3555  out->ApplyFloor(1.0e-20);
3556 
3557  return NULL;
3558 }
3559 
3560 void SoftmaxComponent::Backprop(const std::string &debug_info,
3561  const ComponentPrecomputedIndexes *indexes,
3562  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &, // in_value,
3563  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_value,
3564  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_deriv,
3565  void *memo,
3566  Component *to_update_in,
3567  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *in_deriv) const {
3568 
3569  if (to_update_in) {
3570  SoftmaxComponent *to_update =
3571  dynamic_cast<SoftmaxComponent*>(to_update_in);
3572  to_update->StoreBackpropStats(out_deriv);
3573  }
3574 
3575  if (in_deriv == NULL)
3576  return;
3577  /*
3578  Note on the derivative of the softmax function: let it be
3579  p_i = exp(x_i) / sum_i exp_i
3580  The [matrix-valued] Jacobian of this function is
3581  diag(p) - p p^T
3582  Let the derivative vector at the output be e, and at the input be
3583  d. We have
3584  d = diag(p) e - p (p^T e).
3585  d_i = p_i e_i - p_i (p^T e).
3586  */
3587  in_deriv->DiffSoftmaxPerRow(out_value, out_deriv);
3588 }
3589 
3590 void SoftmaxComponent::StoreStats(const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in_value,
3591  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_value,
3592  void *memo) {
3593  // We don't store derivative stats for this component type, just activation
3594  // stats.
3595  StoreStatsInternal(out_value, NULL);
3596 }
3597 
3598 
3599 void* LogSoftmaxComponent::Propagate(const ComponentPrecomputedIndexes *indexes,
3600  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in,
3601  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *out) const {
3602  // Applies log softmax function to each row of the output. For each row, we do
3603  // x_i = x_i - log(sum_j exp(x_j))
3604  out->ApplyLogSoftMaxPerRow(in);
3605  return NULL;
3606 }
3607 
3608 void LogSoftmaxComponent::Backprop(const std::string &debug_info,
3609  const ComponentPrecomputedIndexes *indexes,
3610  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &, // in_value
3611  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_value,
3612  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_deriv,
3613  void *memo,
3614  Component *to_update_in,
3615  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *in_deriv) const {
3616  if (to_update_in) {
3617  LogSoftmaxComponent *to_update =
3618  dynamic_cast<LogSoftmaxComponent*>(to_update_in);
3619  to_update->StoreBackpropStats(out_deriv);
3620  }
3621  if (in_deriv == NULL)
3622  return;
3623  in_deriv->DiffLogSoftmaxPerRow(out_value, out_deriv);
3624 }
3625 
3626 
3627 void FixedScaleComponent::Init(const CuVectorBase<BaseFloat> &scales) {
3628  KALDI_ASSERT(scales.Dim() != 0);
3629  scales_ = scales;
3630 }
3631 
3632 
3633 void FixedScaleComponent::InitFromConfig(ConfigLine *cfl) {
3634  std::string filename;
3635  // Accepts "scales" config (for filename) or "dim" -> random init, for testing.
3636  if (cfl->GetValue("scales", &filename)) {
3637  if (cfl->HasUnusedValues())
3638  KALDI_ERR << "Invalid initializer for layer of type "
3639  << Type() << ": \"" << cfl->WholeLine() << "\"";
3640  CuVector<BaseFloat> vec;
3641  ReadKaldiObject(filename, &vec);
3642  Init(vec);
3643  } else {
3644  int32 dim;
3645  BaseFloat scale = 1.0;
3646  bool scale_is_set = cfl->GetValue("scale", &scale);
3647  if (!cfl->GetValue("dim", &dim) || cfl->HasUnusedValues())
3648  KALDI_ERR << "Invalid initializer for layer of type "
3649  << Type() << ": \"" << cfl->WholeLine() << "\"";
3650  KALDI_ASSERT(dim > 0);
3651  CuVector<BaseFloat> vec(dim);
3652  if (scale_is_set) {
3653  vec.Set(scale);
3654  } else {
3655  vec.SetRandn();
3656  }
3657  Init(vec);
3658  }
3659 }
3660 
3661 
3662 std::string FixedScaleComponent::Info() const {
3663  std::ostringstream stream;
3664  stream << Component::Info();
3665  PrintParameterStats(stream, "scales", scales_, true);
3666  return stream.str();
3667 }
3668 
3669 void* FixedScaleComponent::Propagate(const ComponentPrecomputedIndexes *indexes,
3670  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in,
3671  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *out) const {
3672  out->CopyFromMat(in); // does nothing if same matrix.
3673  out->MulColsVec(scales_);
3674  return NULL;
3675 }
3676 
3677 void FixedScaleComponent::Backprop(const std::string &debug_info,
3678  const ComponentPrecomputedIndexes *indexes,
3679  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &, // in_value
3680  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &, // out_value
3681  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_deriv,
3682  void *memo,
3683  Component *, // to_update
3684  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *in_deriv) const {
3685  in_deriv->CopyFromMat(out_deriv); // does nothing if same memory.
3686  in_deriv->MulColsVec(scales_);
3687 }
3688 
3689 Component* FixedScaleComponent::Copy() const {
3690  FixedScaleComponent *ans = new FixedScaleComponent();
3691  ans->scales_ = scales_;
3692  return ans;
3693 }

3695

3698  WriteToken(os, binary, "<Scales>");
3699  scales_.Write(os, binary);
3700  WriteToken(os, binary, "</FixedScaleComponent>");
3701 }
3702 
3703 void FixedScaleComponent::Read(std::istream &is, bool binary) {
3704  ExpectOneOrTwoTokens(is, binary, "<FixedScaleComponent>", "<Scales>");
3705  scales_.Read(is, binary);
3706  ExpectToken(is, binary, "</FixedScaleComponent>");
3707 }
3708 
3709 void FixedBiasComponent::Init(const CuVectorBase<BaseFloat> &bias) {
3710  KALDI_ASSERT(bias.Dim() != 0);
3711  bias_ = bias;
3712 }
3713 
3714 void FixedBiasComponent::InitFromConfig(ConfigLine *cfl) {
3715  std::string filename;
3716  // Accepts "bias" config (for filename) or "dim" -> random init, for testing.
3717  if (cfl->GetValue("bias", &filename)) {
3718  if (cfl->HasUnusedValues())
3719  KALDI_ERR << "Invalid initializer for layer of type "
3720  << Type() << ": \"" << cfl->WholeLine() << "\"";
3721  CuVector<BaseFloat> vec;
3722  ReadKaldiObject(filename, &vec);
3723  Init(vec);
3724  } else {
3725  int32 dim;
3726  if (!cfl->GetValue("dim", &dim) || cfl->HasUnusedValues())
3727  KALDI_ERR << "Invalid initializer for layer of type "
3728  << Type() << ": \"" << cfl->WholeLine() << "\"";
3729  KALDI_ASSERT(dim > 0);
3730  CuVector<BaseFloat> vec(dim);
3731  vec.SetRandn();
3732  Init(vec);
3733  }
3734 }
3735 
3736 std::string FixedBiasComponent::Info() const {
3737  std::ostringstream stream;
3738  stream << Component::Info();
3739  PrintParameterStats(stream, "bias", bias_, true);
3740  return stream.str();
3741 }
3742 
3743 void* FixedBiasComponent::Propagate(const ComponentPrecomputedIndexes *indexes,
3744  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in,
3745  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *out) const {
3746  out->CopyFromMat(in); // will do nothing if in and out have same memory.
3747  out->AddVecToRows(1.0, bias_, 1.0);
3748  return NULL;
3749 }
3750 
3751 void FixedBiasComponent::Backprop(const std::string &debug_info,
3752  const ComponentPrecomputedIndexes *indexes,
3753  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &, // in_value
3754  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &, // out_value
3755  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_deriv,
3756  void *memo,
3757  Component *, // to_update
3758  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *in_deriv) const {
3759  // the following statement will do nothing if in_deriv and out_deriv have same
3760  // memory.
3761  in_deriv->CopyFromMat(out_deriv);
3762 }
3763 
3764 Component* FixedBiasComponent::Copy() const {
3765  FixedBiasComponent *ans = new FixedBiasComponent();
3766  ans->bias_ = bias_;
3767  return ans;
3768 }
3769 
3770 
3771 void FixedBiasComponent::Write(std::ostream &os, bool binary) const {
3772  WriteToken(os, binary, "<FixedBiasComponent>");
3773  WriteToken(os, binary, "<Bias>");
3774  bias_.Write(os, binary);
3775  WriteToken(os, binary, "</FixedBiasComponent>");
3776 }
3777 
3778 void FixedBiasComponent::Read(std::istream &is, bool binary) {
3779  ExpectOneOrTwoTokens(is, binary, "<FixedBiasComponent>", "<Bias>");
3780  bias_.Read(is, binary);
3781  ExpectToken(is, binary, "</FixedBiasComponent>");
3782 }
3783 
3784 
3785 void NaturalGradientPerElementScaleComponent::Read(
3786  std::istream &is, bool binary) {
3787  ReadUpdatableCommon(is, binary); // Read the opening tag and learning rate
3788  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<Params>");
3789  scales_.Read(is, binary);
3790  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<IsGradient>");
3791  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &is_gradient_);
3792  int32 rank, update_period;
3793  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<Rank>");
3794  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &rank);
3795  preconditioner_.SetRank(rank);
3796  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<UpdatePeriod>");
3797  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &update_period);
3798  preconditioner_.SetUpdatePeriod(update_period);
3799  BaseFloat num_samples_history, alpha;
3800  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<NumSamplesHistory>");
3801  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &num_samples_history);
3802  preconditioner_.SetNumSamplesHistory(num_samples_history);
3803  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<Alpha>");
3804  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &alpha);
3805  preconditioner_.SetAlpha(alpha);
3806  std::string token;
3807  ReadToken(is, binary, &token);
3808  if (token == "<MaxChangePerMinibatch>") {
3809  // back compatibility; this was removed, it's now handled by the
3810  // 'max-change' config variable.
3811  BaseFloat temp;
3812  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &temp);
3813  ReadToken(is, binary, &token);
3814  }
3815  KALDI_ASSERT(token == "</NaturalGradientPerElementScaleComponent>");
3816 }
3817 
3818 void NaturalGradientPerElementScaleComponent::Write(std::ostream &os,
3819  bool binary) const {
3820  WriteUpdatableCommon(os, binary); // Write the opening tag and learning rate
3821  WriteToken(os, binary, "<Params>");
3822  scales_.Write(os, binary);
3823  WriteToken(os, binary, "<IsGradient>");
3824  WriteBasicType(os, binary, is_gradient_);
3825  WriteToken(os, binary, "<Rank>");
3826  WriteBasicType(os, binary, preconditioner_.GetRank());
3827  WriteToken(os, binary, "<UpdatePeriod>");
3828  WriteBasicType(os, binary, preconditioner_.GetUpdatePeriod());
3829  WriteToken(os, binary, "<NumSamplesHistory>");
3830  WriteBasicType(os, binary, preconditioner_.GetNumSamplesHistory());
3831  WriteToken(os, binary, "<Alpha>");
3832  WriteBasicType(os, binary, preconditioner_.GetAlpha());
3833  WriteToken(os, binary, "</NaturalGradientPerElementScaleComponent>");
3834 }
3835 
3836 std::string NaturalGradientPerElementScaleComponent::Info() const {
3837  std::ostringstream stream;
3838  stream << PerElementScaleComponent::Info()
3839  << ", rank=" << preconditioner_.GetRank()
3840  << ", update-period=" << preconditioner_.GetUpdatePeriod()
3841  << ", num-samples-history=" << preconditioner_.GetNumSamplesHistory()
3842  << ", alpha=" << preconditioner_.GetAlpha();
3843  return stream.str();
3844 }
3845 
3846 void NaturalGradientPerElementScaleComponent::InitFromConfig(ConfigLine *cfl) {
3847  // First set various configuration values that have defaults.
3848  int32 rank = 8, // Use a small rank because in this case the amount of memory
3849  // for the preconditioner actually exceeds the memory for the
3850  // parameters (by "rank").
3851  update_period = 10;
3852  BaseFloat num_samples_history = 2000.0, alpha = 4.0;
3853  cfl->GetValue("rank", &rank);
3854  cfl->GetValue("update-period", &update_period);
3855  cfl->GetValue("num-samples-history", &num_samples_history);
3856  cfl->GetValue("alpha", &alpha);
3857  InitLearningRatesFromConfig(cfl);
3858  std::string filename;
3859  // Accepts "scales" config (for filename) or "dim" -> random init, for testing.
3860  if (cfl->GetValue("scales", &filename)) {
3861  if (cfl->HasUnusedValues())
3862  KALDI_ERR << "Invalid initializer for layer of type "
3863  << Type() << ": \"" << cfl->WholeLine() << "\"";
3864  Init(filename, rank, update_period, num_samples_history, alpha);
3865 
3866  } else {
3867  BaseFloat param_mean = 1.0, param_stddev = 0.0;
3868  cfl->GetValue("param-mean", &param_mean);
3869  cfl->GetValue("param-stddev", &param_stddev);
3870 
3871  int32 dim;
3872  if (!cfl->GetValue("dim", &dim) || cfl->HasUnusedValues())
3873  KALDI_ERR << "Invalid initializer for layer of type "
3874  << Type() << ": \"" << cfl->WholeLine() << "\"";
3875  KALDI_ASSERT(dim > 0);
3876 
3877  Init(dim, param_mean, param_stddev, rank, update_period,
3878  num_samples_history, alpha);
3879  }
3880 }
3881 
3882 void NaturalGradientPerElementScaleComponent::Init(
3883  int32 dim, BaseFloat param_mean,
3884  BaseFloat param_stddev, int32 rank, int32 update_period,
3885  BaseFloat num_samples_history, BaseFloat alpha) {
3886  PerElementScaleComponent::Init(dim, param_mean,
3887  param_stddev);
3888  preconditioner_.SetRank(rank);
3889  preconditioner_.SetUpdatePeriod(update_period);
3890  preconditioner_.SetNumSamplesHistory(num_samples_history);
3891  preconditioner_.SetAlpha(alpha);
3892 }
3893 
3894 void NaturalGradientPerElementScaleComponent::Init(
3895  std::string vector_filename,
3896  int32 rank, int32 update_period, BaseFloat num_samples_history,
3897  BaseFloat alpha) {
3898  PerElementScaleComponent::Init(vector_filename);
3899  preconditioner_.SetRank(rank);
3900  preconditioner_.SetUpdatePeriod(update_period);
3901  preconditioner_.SetNumSamplesHistory(num_samples_history);
3902  preconditioner_.SetAlpha(alpha);
3903 }
3904 
3905 
3906 NaturalGradientPerElementScaleComponent::NaturalGradientPerElementScaleComponent(
3907  const NaturalGradientPerElementScaleComponent &other):
3908  PerElementScaleComponent(other),
3909  preconditioner_(other.preconditioner_) { }
3910 
3911 
3912 
3913 
3914 Component* NaturalGradientPerElementScaleComponent::Copy() const {
3915  return new NaturalGradientPerElementScaleComponent(*this);
3916 }
3917 
3918 void NaturalGradientPerElementScaleComponent::Update(
3919  const std::string &debug_info,
3920  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in_value,
3921  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_deriv) {
3922 
3923  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> derivs_per_frame(in_value);
3924  derivs_per_frame.MulElements(out_deriv);
3925  // the non-natural-gradient update would just do
3926  // scales_.AddRowSumMat(learning_rate_, derivs_per_frame).
3927 
3928  BaseFloat scale;
3929  preconditioner_.PreconditionDirections(&derivs_per_frame, &scale);
3930 
3931  CuVector<BaseFloat> delta_scales(scales_.Dim());
3932  delta_scales.AddRowSumMat(scale * learning_rate_, derivs_per_frame);
3933  scales_.AddVec(1.0, delta_scales);
3934 }
3935 
3936 void NaturalGradientPerElementScaleComponent::FreezeNaturalGradient(bool freeze) {
3937  preconditioner_.Freeze(freeze);
3938 }
3939 
3940 void NaturalGradientPerElementScaleComponent::ConsolidateMemory() {
3941  OnlineNaturalGradient temp(preconditioner_);
3942  preconditioner_.Swap(&temp);
3943 }
3944 
3945 // Constructors for the convolution component
3946 ConvolutionComponent::ConvolutionComponent():
3947  UpdatableComponent(),
3948  input_x_dim_(0), input_y_dim_(0), input_z_dim_(0),
3949  filt_x_dim_(0), filt_y_dim_(0),
3950  filt_x_step_(0), filt_y_step_(0),
3951  input_vectorization_(kZyx) { }
3952 
3953 ConvolutionComponent::ConvolutionComponent(
3954  const ConvolutionComponent &component):
3955  UpdatableComponent(component),
3956  input_x_dim_(component.input_x_dim_),
3957  input_y_dim_(component.input_y_dim_),
3958  input_z_dim_(component.input_z_dim_),
3959  filt_x_dim_(component.filt_x_dim_),
3960  filt_y_dim_(component.filt_y_dim_),
3961  filt_x_step_(component.filt_x_step_),
3962  filt_y_step_(component.filt_y_step_),
3963  input_vectorization_(component.input_vectorization_),
3964  filter_params_(component.filter_params_),
3965  bias_params_(component.bias_params_) { }
3966 
3967 ConvolutionComponent::ConvolutionComponent(
3968  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &filter_params,
3969  const CuVectorBase<BaseFloat> &bias_params,
3970  int32 input_x_dim, int32 input_y_dim, int32 input_z_dim,
3971  int32 filt_x_dim, int32 filt_y_dim,
3972  int32 filt_x_step, int32 filt_y_step,
3973  TensorVectorizationType input_vectorization,
3974  BaseFloat learning_rate):
3975  input_x_dim_(input_x_dim),
3976  input_y_dim_(input_y_dim),
3977  input_z_dim_(input_z_dim),
3978  filt_x_dim_(filt_x_dim),
3979  filt_y_dim_(filt_y_dim),
3980  filt_x_step_(filt_x_step),
3981  filt_y_step_(filt_y_step),
3982  input_vectorization_(input_vectorization),
3983  filter_params_(filter_params),
3984  bias_params_(bias_params){
3985  KALDI_ASSERT(filter_params.NumRows() == bias_params.Dim() &&
3986  bias_params.Dim() != 0);
3987  KALDI_ASSERT(filter_params.NumCols() == filt_x_dim * filt_y_dim * input_z_dim);
3988  SetUnderlyingLearningRate(learning_rate);
3989  is_gradient_ = false;
3990 }
3991 
3992 // aquire input dim
3993 int32 ConvolutionComponent::InputDim() const {
3994  return input_x_dim_ * input_y_dim_ * input_z_dim_;
3995 }
3996 
3997 // aquire output dim
3998 int32 ConvolutionComponent::OutputDim() const {
3999  int32 num_x_steps = (1 + (input_x_dim_ - filt_x_dim_) / filt_x_step_);
4000  int32 num_y_steps = (1 + (input_y_dim_ - filt_y_dim_) / filt_y_step_);
4001  int32 num_filters = filter_params_.NumRows();
4002  return num_x_steps * num_y_steps * num_filters;
4003 }
4004 
4005 // initialize the component using hyperparameters
4006 void ConvolutionComponent::Init(
4007  int32 input_x_dim, int32 input_y_dim, int32 input_z_dim,
4008  int32 filt_x_dim, int32 filt_y_dim,
4009  int32 filt_x_step, int32 filt_y_step, int32 num_filters,
4010  TensorVectorizationType input_vectorization,
4011  BaseFloat param_stddev, BaseFloat bias_stddev) {
4012  input_x_dim_ = input_x_dim;
4013  input_y_dim_ = input_y_dim;
4014  input_z_dim_ = input_z_dim;
4015  filt_x_dim_ = filt_x_dim;
4016  filt_y_dim_ = filt_y_dim;
4017  filt_x_step_ = filt_x_step;
4018  filt_y_step_ = filt_y_step;
4019  input_vectorization_ = input_vectorization;
4020  KALDI_ASSERT((input_x_dim_ - filt_x_dim_) % filt_x_step_ == 0);
4021  KALDI_ASSERT((input_y_dim_ - filt_y_dim_) % filt_y_step_ == 0);
4022  int32 filter_dim = filt_x_dim_ * filt_y_dim_ * input_z_dim_;
4023  filter_params_.Resize(num_filters, filter_dim);
4024  bias_params_.Resize(num_filters);
4025  KALDI_ASSERT(param_stddev >= 0.0 && bias_stddev >= 0.0);
4026  filter_params_.SetRandn();
4027  filter_params_.Scale(param_stddev);
4028  bias_params_.SetRandn();
4029  bias_params_.Scale(bias_stddev);
4030 }
4031 
4032 // initialize the component using predefined matrix file
4033 void ConvolutionComponent::Init(
4034  int32 input_x_dim, int32 input_y_dim, int32 input_z_dim,
4035  int32 filt_x_dim, int32 filt_y_dim,
4036  int32 filt_x_step, int32 filt_y_step,
4037  TensorVectorizationType input_vectorization,
