4038  std::string matrix_filename) {
4039  input_x_dim_ = input_x_dim;
4040  input_y_dim_ = input_y_dim;
4041  input_z_dim_ = input_z_dim;
4042  filt_x_dim_ = filt_x_dim;
4043  filt_y_dim_ = filt_y_dim;
4044  filt_x_step_ = filt_x_step;
4045  filt_y_step_ = filt_y_step;
4046  input_vectorization_ = input_vectorization;
4047  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> mat;
4048  ReadKaldiObject(matrix_filename, &mat);
4049  int32 filter_dim = (filt_x_dim_ * filt_y_dim_ * input_z_dim_);
4050  int32 num_filters = mat.NumRows();
4051  KALDI_ASSERT(mat.NumCols() == (filter_dim + 1));
4052  filter_params_.Resize(num_filters, filter_dim);
4053  bias_params_.Resize(num_filters);
4054  filter_params_.CopyFromMat(mat.Range(0, num_filters, 0, filter_dim));
4055  bias_params_.CopyColFromMat(mat, filter_dim);
4056 }
4057 
4058 // display information about component
4059 std::string ConvolutionComponent::Info() const {
4060  std::ostringstream stream;
4061  stream << UpdatableComponent::Info()
4062  << ", input-x-dim=" << input_x_dim_
4063  << ", input-y-dim=" << input_y_dim_
4064  << ", input-z-dim=" << input_z_dim_
4065  << ", filt-x-dim=" << filt_x_dim_
4066  << ", filt-y-dim=" << filt_y_dim_
4067  << ", filt-x-step=" << filt_x_step_
4068  << ", filt-y-step=" << filt_y_step_
4069  << ", input-vectorization=" << input_vectorization_
4070  << ", num-filters=" << filter_params_.NumRows();
4071  PrintParameterStats(stream, "filter-params", filter_params_);
4072  PrintParameterStats(stream, "bias-params", bias_params_, true);
4073  return stream.str();
4074 }
4075 
4076 // initialize the component using configuration file
4077 void ConvolutionComponent::InitFromConfig(ConfigLine *cfl) {
4078  bool ok = true;
4079  std::string matrix_filename;
4080  int32 input_x_dim = -1, input_y_dim = -1, input_z_dim = -1,
4081  filt_x_dim = -1, filt_y_dim = -1,
4082  filt_x_step = -1, filt_y_step = -1,
4083  num_filters = -1;
4084  std::string input_vectorization_order = "zyx";
4085  InitLearningRatesFromConfig(cfl);
4086  ok = ok && cfl->GetValue("input-x-dim", &input_x_dim);
4087  ok = ok && cfl->GetValue("input-y-dim", &input_y_dim);
4088  ok = ok && cfl->GetValue("input-z-dim", &input_z_dim);
4089  ok = ok && cfl->GetValue("filt-x-dim", &filt_x_dim);
4090  ok = ok && cfl->GetValue("filt-y-dim", &filt_y_dim);
4091  ok = ok && cfl->GetValue("filt-x-step", &filt_x_step);
4092  ok = ok && cfl->GetValue("filt-y-step", &filt_y_step);
4093 
4094  if (!ok)
4095  KALDI_ERR << "Bad initializer " << cfl->WholeLine();
4096  // optional argument
4097  TensorVectorizationType input_vectorization;
4098  cfl->GetValue("input-vectorization-order", &input_vectorization_order);
4099  if (input_vectorization_order.compare("zyx") == 0) {
4100  input_vectorization = kZyx;
4101  } else if (input_vectorization_order.compare("yzx") == 0) {
4102  input_vectorization = kYzx;
4103  } else {
4104  KALDI_ERR << "Unknown or unsupported input vectorization order "
4105  << input_vectorization_order
4106  << " accepted candidates are 'yzx' and 'zyx'";
4107  }
4108 
4109  if (cfl->GetValue("matrix", &matrix_filename)) {
4110  // initialize from prefined parameter matrix
4111  Init(input_x_dim, input_y_dim, input_z_dim,
4112  filt_x_dim, filt_y_dim,
4113  filt_x_step, filt_y_step,
4114  input_vectorization,
4115  matrix_filename);
4116  } else {
4117  ok = ok && cfl->GetValue("num-filters", &num_filters);
4118  if (!ok)
4119  KALDI_ERR << "Bad initializer " << cfl->WholeLine();
4120  // initialize from configuration
4121  int32 filter_input_dim = filt_x_dim * filt_y_dim * input_z_dim;
4122  BaseFloat param_stddev = 1.0 / std::sqrt(filter_input_dim), bias_stddev = 1.0;
4123  cfl->GetValue("param-stddev", &param_stddev);
4124  cfl->GetValue("bias-stddev", &bias_stddev);
4125  Init(input_x_dim, input_y_dim, input_z_dim,
4126  filt_x_dim, filt_y_dim, filt_x_step, filt_y_step, num_filters,
4127  input_vectorization, param_stddev, bias_stddev);
4128  }
4129  if (cfl->HasUnusedValues())
4130  KALDI_ERR << "Could not process these elements in initializer: "
4131  << cfl->UnusedValues();
4132  if (!ok)
4133  KALDI_ERR << "Bad initializer " << cfl->WholeLine();
4134 }
4135 
4136 // Inline methods to convert from tensor index i.e., (x,y,z) index
4137 // to index in yzx or zyx vectorized tensors
4138 inline int32 YzxVectorIndex(int32 x, int32 y, int32 z,
4139  int32 input_x_dim,
4140  int32 input_y_dim,
4141  int32 input_z_dim) {
4142  KALDI_PARANOID_ASSERT(x < input_x_dim && y < input_y_dim && z < input_z_dim);
4143  return (input_y_dim * input_z_dim) * x + (input_y_dim) * z + y;
4144 }
4145 
4146 inline int32 ZyxVectorIndex(int32 x, int32 y, int32 z,
4147  int32 input_x_dim,
4148  int32 input_y_dim,
4149  int32 input_z_dim) {
4150  KALDI_PARANOID_ASSERT(x < input_x_dim && y < input_y_dim && z < input_z_dim);
4151  return (input_y_dim * input_z_dim) * x + (input_z_dim) * y + z;
4152 }
4153 
4154 // Method to convert from a matrix representing a minibatch of vectorized
4155 // 3D tensors to patches for convolution, each patch corresponds to
4156 // one dot product in the convolution
4157 void ConvolutionComponent::InputToInputPatches(
4158  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat>& in,
4159  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> *patches) const{
4160  int32 num_x_steps = (1 + (input_x_dim_ - filt_x_dim_) / filt_x_step_);
4161  int32 num_y_steps = (1 + (input_y_dim_ - filt_y_dim_) / filt_y_step_);
4162  const int32 filt_x_step = filt_x_step_,
4163  filt_y_step = filt_y_step_,
4164  filt_x_dim = filt_x_dim_,
4165  filt_y_dim = filt_y_dim_,
4166  input_x_dim = input_x_dim_,
4167  input_y_dim = input_y_dim_,
4168  input_z_dim = input_z_dim_,
4169  filter_dim = filter_params_.NumCols();
4170 
4171  std::vector<int32> column_map(patches->NumCols());
4172  int32 column_map_size = column_map.size();
4173  for (int32 x_step = 0; x_step < num_x_steps; x_step++) {
4174  for (int32 y_step = 0; y_step < num_y_steps; y_step++) {
4175  int32 patch_number = x_step * num_y_steps + y_step;
4176  int32 patch_start_index = patch_number * filter_dim;
4177  for (int32 x = 0, index = patch_start_index; x < filt_x_dim; x++) {
4178  for (int32 y = 0; y < filt_y_dim; y++) {
4179  for (int32 z = 0; z < input_z_dim; z++, index++) {
4180  KALDI_ASSERT(index < column_map_size);
4181  if (input_vectorization_ == kZyx) {
4182  column_map[index] = ZyxVectorIndex(x_step * filt_x_step + x,
4183  y_step * filt_y_step + y, z,
4184  input_x_dim, input_y_dim,
4185  input_z_dim);
4186  } else if (input_vectorization_ == kYzx) {
4187  column_map[index] = YzxVectorIndex(x_step * filt_x_step + x,
4188  y_step * filt_y_step + y, z,
4189  input_x_dim, input_y_dim,
4190  input_z_dim);
4191  }
4192  }
4193  }
4194  }
4195  }
4196  }
4197  CuArray<int32> cu_cols(column_map);
4198  patches->CopyCols(in, cu_cols);
4199 }
4200 
4201 
4202 // propagation function
4203 // see function declaration in nnet-simple-component.h for details
4204 void* ConvolutionComponent::Propagate(const ComponentPrecomputedIndexes *indexes,
4205  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in,
4206  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *out) const {
4207  const int32 num_x_steps = (1 + (input_x_dim_ - filt_x_dim_) / filt_x_step_),
4208  num_y_steps = (1 + (input_y_dim_ - filt_y_dim_) / filt_y_step_),
4209  num_filters = filter_params_.NumRows(),
4210  num_frames = in.NumRows(),
4211  filter_dim = filter_params_.NumCols();
4212  KALDI_ASSERT((*out).NumRows() == num_frames &&
4213  (*out).NumCols() == (num_filters * num_x_steps * num_y_steps));
4214 
4215  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> patches(num_frames,
4216  num_x_steps * num_y_steps * filter_dim,
4217  kUndefined);
4218  InputToInputPatches(in, &patches);
4219  CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat>* filter_params_elem = new CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat>(
4220  filter_params_, 0, filter_params_.NumRows(), 0, filter_params_.NumCols());
4221  std::vector<CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat>* > tgt_batch, patch_batch,
4222  filter_params_batch;
4223 
4224  for (int32 x_step = 0; x_step < num_x_steps; x_step++) {
4225  for (int32 y_step = 0; y_step < num_y_steps; y_step++) {
4226  int32 patch_number = x_step * num_y_steps + y_step;
4227  tgt_batch.push_back(new CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat>(
4228  out->ColRange(patch_number * num_filters, num_filters)));
4229  patch_batch.push_back(new CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat>(
4230  patches.ColRange(patch_number * filter_dim, filter_dim)));
4231  filter_params_batch.push_back(filter_params_elem);
4232  tgt_batch[patch_number]->AddVecToRows(1.0, bias_params_, 1.0); // add bias
4233  }
4234  }
4235  // apply all filters
4236  AddMatMatBatched<BaseFloat>(1.0, tgt_batch, patch_batch,
4237  kNoTrans, filter_params_batch,
4238  kTrans, 1.0);
4239  // release memory
4240  delete filter_params_elem;
4241  for (int32 p = 0; p < tgt_batch.size(); p++) {
4242  delete tgt_batch[p];
4243  delete patch_batch[p];
4244  }
4245  return NULL;
4246 }
4247 
4248 // scale the parameters
4249 void ConvolutionComponent::Scale(BaseFloat scale) {
4250  if (scale == 0.0) {
4251  filter_params_.SetZero();
4252  bias_params_.SetZero();
4253  } else {
4254  filter_params_.Scale(scale);
4255  bias_params_.Scale(scale);
4256  }
4257 }
4258 
4259 // add another convolution component
4260 void ConvolutionComponent::Add(BaseFloat alpha, const Component &other_in) {
4261  const ConvolutionComponent *other =
4262  dynamic_cast<const ConvolutionComponent*>(&other_in);
4263  KALDI_ASSERT(other != NULL);
4264  filter_params_.AddMat(alpha, other->filter_params_);
4265  bias_params_.AddVec(alpha, other->bias_params_);
4266 }
4267 
4268 /*
4269  This function transforms a vector of lists into a list of vectors,
4270  padded with -1.
4271  @param[in] The input vector of lists. Let in.size() be D, and let
4272  the longest list length (i.e. the max of in[i].size()) be L.
4273  @param[out] The output list of vectors. The length of the list will
4274  be L, each vector-dimension will be D (i.e. out[i].size() == D),
4275  and if in[i] == j, then for some k we will have that
4276  out[k][j] = i. The output vectors are padded with -1
4277  where necessary if not all the input lists have the same side.
4278 */
4279 void RearrangeIndexes(const std::vector<std::vector<int32> > &in,
4280  std::vector<std::vector<int32> > *out) {
4281  int32 D = in.size();
4282  int32 L = 0;
4283  for (int32 i = 0; i < D; i++)
4284  if (in[i].size() > L)
4285  L = in[i].size();
4286  out->resize(L);
4287  for (int32 i = 0; i < L; i++)
4288  (*out)[i].resize(D, -1);
4289  for (int32 i = 0; i < D; i++) {
4290  for (int32 j = 0; j < in[i].size(); j++) {
4291  (*out)[j][i] = in[i][j];
4292  }
4293  }
4294 }
4295 
4296 // Method to compute the input derivative matrix from the input derivatives
4297 // for patches, where each patch corresponds to one dot product
4298 // in the convolution
4299 void ConvolutionComponent::InderivPatchesToInderiv(
4300  const CuMatrix<BaseFloat>& in_deriv_patches,
4301  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *in_deriv) const {
4302 
4303  const int32 num_x_steps = (1 + (input_x_dim_ - filt_x_dim_) / filt_x_step_),
4304  num_y_steps = (1 + (input_y_dim_ - filt_y_dim_) / filt_y_step_),
4305  filt_x_step = filt_x_step_,
4306  filt_y_step = filt_y_step_,
4307  filt_x_dim = filt_x_dim_,
4308  filt_y_dim = filt_y_dim_,
4309  input_x_dim = input_x_dim_,
4310  input_y_dim = input_y_dim_,
4311  input_z_dim = input_z_dim_,
4312  filter_dim = filter_params_.NumCols();
4313 
4314  // Compute the reverse column_map from the matrix with input
4315  // derivative patches to input derivative matrix
4316  std::vector<std::vector<int32> > reverse_column_map(in_deriv->NumCols());
4317  int32 rev_col_map_size = reverse_column_map.size();
4318  for (int32 x_step = 0; x_step < num_x_steps; x_step++) {
4319  for (int32 y_step = 0; y_step < num_y_steps; y_step++) {
4320  int32 patch_number = x_step * num_y_steps + y_step;
4321  int32 patch_start_index = patch_number * filter_dim;
4322  for (int32 x = 0, index = patch_start_index; x < filt_x_dim; x++) {
4323  for (int32 y = 0; y < filt_y_dim; y++) {
4324  for (int32 z = 0; z < input_z_dim; z++, index++) {
4325  int32 vector_index;
4326  if (input_vectorization_ == kZyx) {
4327  vector_index = ZyxVectorIndex(x_step * filt_x_step + x,
4328  y_step * filt_y_step + y, z,
4329  input_x_dim, input_y_dim,
4330  input_z_dim);
4331  } else {
4332  KALDI_ASSERT(input_vectorization_ == kYzx);
4333  vector_index = YzxVectorIndex(x_step * filt_x_step + x,
4334  y_step * filt_y_step + y, z,
4335  input_x_dim, input_y_dim,
4336  input_z_dim);
4337  }
4338  KALDI_ASSERT(vector_index < rev_col_map_size);
4339  reverse_column_map[vector_index].push_back(index);
4340  }
4341  }
4342  }
4343  }
4344  }
4345  std::vector<std::vector<int32> > rearranged_column_map;
4346  RearrangeIndexes(reverse_column_map, &rearranged_column_map);
4347  for (int32 p = 0; p < rearranged_column_map.size(); p++) {
4348  CuArray<int32> cu_cols(rearranged_column_map[p]);
4349  in_deriv->AddCols(in_deriv_patches, cu_cols);
4350  }
4351 }
4352 
4353 // back propagation function
4354 // see function declaration in nnet-simple-component.h for details
4355 void ConvolutionComponent::Backprop(const std::string &debug_info,
4356  const ComponentPrecomputedIndexes *indexes,
4357  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in_value,
4358  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &, // out_value,
4359  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_deriv,
4360  void *memo,
4361  Component *to_update_in,
4362  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *in_deriv) const {
4363  ConvolutionComponent *to_update =
4364  dynamic_cast<ConvolutionComponent*>(to_update_in);
4365  const int32 num_x_steps = (1 + (input_x_dim_ - filt_x_dim_) / filt_x_step_),
4366  num_y_steps = (1 + (input_y_dim_ - filt_y_dim_) / filt_y_step_),
4367  num_filters = filter_params_.NumRows(),
4368  num_frames = out_deriv.NumRows(),
4369  filter_dim = filter_params_.NumCols();
4370 
4371  KALDI_ASSERT(out_deriv.NumRows() == num_frames &&
4372  out_deriv.NumCols() ==
4373  (num_filters * num_x_steps * num_y_steps));
4374 
4375  // Compute inderiv patches
4376  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> in_deriv_patches(num_frames,
4377  num_x_steps * num_y_steps * filter_dim,
4378  kSetZero);
4379 
4380  std::vector<CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat>* > patch_deriv_batch, out_deriv_batch,
4381  filter_params_batch;
4382  CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat>* filter_params_elem = new CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat>(
4383  filter_params_, 0, filter_params_.NumRows(), 0, filter_params_.NumCols());
4384 
4385  for (int32 x_step = 0; x_step < num_x_steps; x_step++) {
4386  for (int32 y_step = 0; y_step < num_y_steps; y_step++) {
4387  int32 patch_number = x_step * num_y_steps + y_step;
4388 
4389  patch_deriv_batch.push_back(new CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat>(
4390  in_deriv_patches.ColRange(
4391  patch_number * filter_dim, filter_dim)));
4392  out_deriv_batch.push_back(new CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat>(out_deriv.ColRange(
4393  patch_number * num_filters, num_filters)));
4394  filter_params_batch.push_back(filter_params_elem);
4395  }
4396  }
4397  AddMatMatBatched<BaseFloat>(1.0, patch_deriv_batch,
4398  out_deriv_batch, kNoTrans,
4399  filter_params_batch, kNoTrans, 0.0);
4400 
4401  if (in_deriv) {
4402  // combine the derivatives from the individual input deriv patches
4403  // to compute input deriv matrix
4404  InderivPatchesToInderiv(in_deriv_patches, in_deriv);
4405  }
4406 
4407  if (to_update != NULL) {
4408  to_update->Update(debug_info, in_value, out_deriv, out_deriv_batch);
4409  }
4410 
4411  // release memory
4412  delete filter_params_elem;
4413  for (int32 p = 0; p < patch_deriv_batch.size(); p++) {
4414  delete patch_deriv_batch[p];
4415  delete out_deriv_batch[p];
4416  }
4417 }
4418 
4419 
4420 // update parameters
4421 // see function declaration in nnet-simple-component.h for details
4422 void ConvolutionComponent::Update(const std::string &debug_info,
4423  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in_value,
4424  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_deriv,
4425  const std::vector<CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat> *>& out_deriv_batch) {
4426  // useful dims
4427  const int32 num_x_steps = (1 + (input_x_dim_ - filt_x_dim_) / filt_x_step_),
4428  num_y_steps = (1 + (input_y_dim_ - filt_y_dim_) / filt_y_step_),
4429  num_filters = filter_params_.NumRows(),
4430  num_frames = out_deriv.NumRows(),
4431  filter_dim = filter_params_.NumCols();
4432  KALDI_ASSERT(out_deriv.NumRows() == num_frames &&
4433  out_deriv.NumCols() ==
4434  (num_filters * num_x_steps * num_y_steps));
4435 
4436 
4437  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> filters_grad;
4438  CuVector<BaseFloat> bias_grad;
4439 
4440  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> input_patches(num_frames,
4441  filter_dim * num_x_steps * num_y_steps,
4442  kUndefined);
4443  InputToInputPatches(in_value, &input_patches);
4444 
4445  filters_grad.Resize(num_filters, filter_dim, kSetZero); // reset
4446  bias_grad.Resize(num_filters, kSetZero); // reset
4447 
4448  // create a single large matrix holding the smaller matrices
4449  // from the vector container filters_grad_batch along the rows
4450  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> filters_grad_blocks_batch(
4451  num_x_steps * num_y_steps * filters_grad.NumRows(),
4452  filters_grad.NumCols());
4453 
4454  std::vector<CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat>* > filters_grad_batch, input_patch_batch;
4455 
4456  for (int32 x_step = 0; x_step < num_x_steps; x_step++) {
4457  for (int32 y_step = 0; y_step < num_y_steps; y_step++) {
4458  int32 patch_number = x_step * num_y_steps + y_step;
4459  filters_grad_batch.push_back(new CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat>(
4460  filters_grad_blocks_batch.RowRange(
4461  patch_number * filters_grad.NumRows(), filters_grad.NumRows())));
4462 
4463  input_patch_batch.push_back(new CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat>(
4464  input_patches.ColRange(patch_number * filter_dim, filter_dim)));
4465  }
4466  }
4467 
4468  AddMatMatBatched<BaseFloat>(1.0, filters_grad_batch, out_deriv_batch, kTrans,
4469  input_patch_batch, kNoTrans, 1.0);
4470 
4471  // add the row blocks together to filters_grad
4472  filters_grad.AddMatBlocks(1.0, filters_grad_blocks_batch);
4473 
4474  // create a matrix holding the col blocks sum of out_deriv
4475  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> out_deriv_col_blocks_sum(out_deriv.NumRows(),
4476  num_filters);
4477 
4478  // add the col blocks together to out_deriv_col_blocks_sum
4479  out_deriv_col_blocks_sum.AddMatBlocks(1.0, out_deriv);
4480 
4481  bias_grad.AddRowSumMat(1.0, out_deriv_col_blocks_sum, 1.0);
4482 
4483  // release memory
4484  for (int32 p = 0; p < input_patch_batch.size(); p++) {
4485  delete filters_grad_batch[p];
4486  delete input_patch_batch[p];
4487  }
4488 
4489  //
4490  // update
4491  //
4492  filter_params_.AddMat(learning_rate_, filters_grad);
4493  bias_params_.AddVec(learning_rate_, bias_grad);
4494 }
4495 
4496 void ConvolutionComponent::Read(std::istream &is, bool binary) {
4497  ReadUpdatableCommon(is, binary); // Read opening tag and learning rate.
4498  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<InputXDim>");
4499  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &input_x_dim_);
4500  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<InputYDim>");
4501  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &input_y_dim_);
4502  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<InputZDim>");
4503  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &input_z_dim_);
4504  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<FiltXDim>");
4505  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &filt_x_dim_);
4506  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<FiltYDim>");
4507  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &filt_y_dim_);
4508  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<FiltXStep>");
4509  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &filt_x_step_);
4510  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<FiltYStep>");
4511  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &filt_y_step_);
4512  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<InputVectorization>");
4513  int32 input_vectorization;
4514  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &input_vectorization);
4515  input_vectorization_ = static_cast<TensorVectorizationType>(input_vectorization);
4516  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<FilterParams>");
4517  filter_params_.Read(is, binary);
4518  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<BiasParams>");
4519  bias_params_.Read(is, binary);
4520  std::string tok;
4521  ReadToken(is, binary, &tok);
4522  if (tok == "<IsGradient>") {
4523  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &is_gradient_);
4524  ExpectToken(is, binary, "</ConvolutionComponent>");
4525  } else {
4526  is_gradient_ = false;
4527  KALDI_ASSERT(tok == "</ConvolutionComponent>");
4528  }
4529 }
4530 
4531 void ConvolutionComponent::Write(std::ostream &os, bool binary) const {
4532  WriteUpdatableCommon(os, binary); // write opening tag and learning rate.
4533  WriteToken(os, binary, "<InputXDim>");
4534  WriteBasicType(os, binary, input_x_dim_);
4535  WriteToken(os, binary, "<InputYDim>");
4536  WriteBasicType(os, binary, input_y_dim_);
4537  WriteToken(os, binary, "<InputZDim>");
4538  WriteBasicType(os, binary, input_z_dim_);
4539  WriteToken(os, binary, "<FiltXDim>");
4540  WriteBasicType(os, binary, filt_x_dim_);
4541  WriteToken(os, binary, "<FiltYDim>");
4542  WriteBasicType(os, binary, filt_y_dim_);
4543  WriteToken(os, binary, "<FiltXStep>");
4544  WriteBasicType(os, binary, filt_x_step_);
4545  WriteToken(os, binary, "<FiltYStep>");
4546  WriteBasicType(os, binary, filt_y_step_);
4547  WriteToken(os, binary, "<InputVectorization>");
4548  WriteBasicType(os, binary, static_cast<int32>(input_vectorization_));
4549  WriteToken(os, binary, "<FilterParams>");
4550  filter_params_.Write(os, binary);
4551  WriteToken(os, binary, "<BiasParams>");
4552  bias_params_.Write(os, binary);
4553  WriteToken(os, binary, "<IsGradient>");
4554  WriteBasicType(os, binary, is_gradient_);
4555  WriteToken(os, binary, "</ConvolutionComponent>");
4556 }
4557 
4558 BaseFloat ConvolutionComponent::DotProduct(const UpdatableComponent &other_in) const {
4559  const ConvolutionComponent *other =
4560  dynamic_cast<const ConvolutionComponent*>(&other_in);
4561  return TraceMatMat(filter_params_, other->filter_params_, kTrans)
4562  + VecVec(bias_params_, other->bias_params_);
4563 }
4564 
4565 Component* ConvolutionComponent::Copy() const {
4566  ConvolutionComponent *ans = new ConvolutionComponent(*this);
4567  return ans;
4568 }
4569 
4570 void ConvolutionComponent::PerturbParams(BaseFloat stddev) {
4571  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> temp_filter_params(filter_params_);
4572  temp_filter_params.SetRandn();
4573  filter_params_.AddMat(stddev, temp_filter_params);
4574 
4575  CuVector<BaseFloat> temp_bias_params(bias_params_);
4576  temp_bias_params.SetRandn();
4577  bias_params_.AddVec(stddev, temp_bias_params);
4578 }
4579 
4580 void ConvolutionComponent::SetParams(const VectorBase<BaseFloat> &bias,
4581  const MatrixBase<BaseFloat> &filter) {
4582  bias_params_ = bias;
4583  filter_params_ = filter;
4584  KALDI_ASSERT(bias_params_.Dim() == filter_params_.NumRows());
4585 }
4586 
4587 int32 ConvolutionComponent::NumParameters() const {
4588  return (filter_params_.NumCols() + 1) * filter_params_.NumRows();
4589 }
4590 
4591 void ConvolutionComponent::Vectorize(VectorBase<BaseFloat> *params) const {
4592  KALDI_ASSERT(params->Dim() == this->NumParameters());
4593  int32 num_filter_params = filter_params_.NumCols() * filter_params_.NumRows();
4594  params->Range(0, num_filter_params).CopyRowsFromMat(filter_params_);
4595  params->Range(num_filter_params, bias_params_.Dim()).CopyFromVec(bias_params_);
4596 }
4597 void ConvolutionComponent::UnVectorize(const VectorBase<BaseFloat> &params) {
4598  KALDI_ASSERT(params.Dim() == this->NumParameters());
4599  int32 num_filter_params = filter_params_.NumCols() * filter_params_.NumRows();
4600  filter_params_.CopyRowsFromVec(params.Range(0, num_filter_params));
4601  bias_params_.CopyFromVec(params.Range(num_filter_params, bias_params_.Dim()));
4602 }
4603 
4604 // aquire input dim
4605 int32 MaxpoolingComponent::InputDim() const {
4606  return input_x_dim_ * input_y_dim_ * input_z_dim_;
4607 }
4608 
4609 MaxpoolingComponent::MaxpoolingComponent(
4610  const MaxpoolingComponent &component):
4611  input_x_dim_(component.input_x_dim_),
4612  input_y_dim_(component.input_y_dim_),
4613  input_z_dim_(component.input_z_dim_),
4614  pool_x_size_(component.pool_x_size_),
4615  pool_y_size_(component.pool_y_size_),
4616  pool_z_size_(component.pool_z_size_),
4617  pool_x_step_(component.pool_x_step_),
4618  pool_y_step_(component.pool_y_step_),
4619  pool_z_step_(component.pool_z_step_) { }
4620 
4621 // aquire output dim
4622 int32 MaxpoolingComponent::OutputDim() const {
4623  int32 num_pools_x = 1 + (input_x_dim_ - pool_x_size_) / pool_x_step_;
4624  int32 num_pools_y = 1 + (input_y_dim_ - pool_y_size_) / pool_y_step_;
4625  int32 num_pools_z = 1 + (input_z_dim_ - pool_z_size_) / pool_z_step_;
4626  return num_pools_x * num_pools_y * num_pools_z;
4627 }
4628 
4629 // check the component parameters
4630 void MaxpoolingComponent::Check() const {
4631  // sanity check of the max pooling parameters
4632  KALDI_ASSERT(input_x_dim_ > 0);
4633  KALDI_ASSERT(input_y_dim_ > 0);
4634  KALDI_ASSERT(input_z_dim_ > 0);
4635  KALDI_ASSERT(pool_x_size_ > 0);
4636  KALDI_ASSERT(pool_y_size_ > 0);
4637  KALDI_ASSERT(pool_z_size_ > 0);
4638  KALDI_ASSERT(pool_x_step_ > 0);
4639  KALDI_ASSERT(pool_y_step_ > 0);
4640  KALDI_ASSERT(pool_z_step_ > 0);
4641  KALDI_ASSERT(input_x_dim_ >= pool_x_size_);
4642  KALDI_ASSERT(input_y_dim_ >= pool_y_size_);
4643  KALDI_ASSERT(input_z_dim_ >= pool_z_size_);
4644  KALDI_ASSERT(pool_x_size_ >= pool_x_step_);
4645  KALDI_ASSERT(pool_y_size_ >= pool_y_step_);
4646  KALDI_ASSERT(pool_z_size_ >= pool_z_step_);
4647  KALDI_ASSERT((input_x_dim_ - pool_x_size_) % pool_x_step_ == 0);
4648  KALDI_ASSERT((input_y_dim_ - pool_y_size_) % pool_y_step_ == 0);
4649  KALDI_ASSERT((input_z_dim_ - pool_z_size_) % pool_z_step_ == 0);
4650 }
4651 
4652 // initialize the component using configuration file
4653 void MaxpoolingComponent::InitFromConfig(ConfigLine *cfl) {
4654  bool ok = true;
4655 
4656  ok = ok && cfl->GetValue("input-x-dim", &input_x_dim_);
4657  ok = ok && cfl->GetValue("input-y-dim", &input_y_dim_);
4658  ok = ok && cfl->GetValue("input-z-dim", &input_z_dim_);
4659  ok = ok && cfl->GetValue("pool-x-size", &pool_x_size_);
4660  ok = ok && cfl->GetValue("pool-y-size", &pool_y_size_);
4661  ok = ok && cfl->GetValue("pool-z-size", &pool_z_size_);
4662  ok = ok && cfl->GetValue("pool-x-step", &pool_x_step_);
4663  ok = ok && cfl->GetValue("pool-y-step", &pool_y_step_);
4664  ok = ok && cfl->GetValue("pool-z-step", &pool_z_step_);
4665 
4666  if (cfl->HasUnusedValues())
4667  KALDI_ERR << "Could not process these elements in initializer: "
4668  << cfl->UnusedValues();
4669  if (!ok)
4670  KALDI_ERR << "Bad initializer " << cfl->WholeLine();
4671 
4672  Check();
4673 }
4674 
4675 // Method to convert from a matrix representing a minibatch of vectorized
4676 // 3D tensors to patches for 3d max pooling, each patch corresponds to
4677 // the nodes having the same local coordinatenodes from each pool
4678 void MaxpoolingComponent::InputToInputPatches(
4679  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat>& in,
4680  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> *patches) const{
4681  int32 num_pools_x = 1 + (input_x_dim_ - pool_x_size_) / pool_x_step_;
4682  int32 num_pools_y = 1 + (input_y_dim_ - pool_y_size_) / pool_y_step_;
4683  int32 num_pools_z = 1 + (input_z_dim_ - pool_z_size_) / pool_z_step_;
4684 
4685  std::vector<int32> column_map(patches->NumCols());
4686  int32 column_map_size = column_map.size();
4687  for (int32 x = 0, index =0; x < pool_x_size_; x++) {
4688  for (int32 y = 0; y < pool_y_size_; y++) {
4689  for (int32 z = 0; z < pool_z_size_; z++) {
4690  // given the local node coordinate, group them from each pool
4691  // to form a patch
4692  for (int32 x_pool = 0; x_pool < num_pools_x; x_pool++) {
4693  for (int32 y_pool = 0; y_pool < num_pools_y; y_pool++) {
4694  for (int32 z_pool = 0; z_pool < num_pools_z; z_pool++, index++) {
4695  KALDI_ASSERT(index < column_map_size);
4696  column_map[index] = (x_pool * pool_x_step_ + x) * input_y_dim_ * input_z_dim_ +
4697  (y_pool * pool_y_step_ + y) * input_z_dim_ +
4698  (z_pool * pool_z_step_ + z);
4699 
4700  }
4701  }
4702  }
4703  }
4704  }
4705  }
4706  CuArray<int32> cu_cols(column_map);
4707  patches->CopyCols(in, cu_cols);
4708 }
4709 
4710 /*
4711  This is the 3d max pooling propagate function.
4712  It is assumed that each row of the input matrix
4713  is a vectorized 3D-tensor of type zxy.
4714  Similar to the propagate function of ConvolutionComponent,
4715  the input matrix is first arranged into patches so that
4716  pools (with / without overlapping) could be
4717  processed in a parallelizable manner.
4718  The output matrix is also a vectorized 3D-tensor of type zxy.
4719 */
4720 
4721 void* MaxpoolingComponent::Propagate(const ComponentPrecomputedIndexes *indexes,
4722  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in,
4723  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *out) const {
4724  int32 num_frames = in.NumRows();
4725  int32 num_pools = OutputDim();
4726  int32 pool_size = pool_x_size_ * pool_y_size_ * pool_z_size_;
4727  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> patches(num_frames, num_pools * pool_size, kUndefined);
4728  InputToInputPatches(in, &patches);
4729 
4730  out->Set(-1e20); // reset a large negative value
4731  for (int32 q = 0; q < pool_size; q++)
4732  out->Max(patches.ColRange(q * num_pools, num_pools));
4733  return NULL;
4734 }
4735 
4736 // Method to compute the input derivative matrix from the input derivatives
4737 // for patches, where each patch corresponds to
4738 // the nodes having the same local coordinatenodes from each pool
4739 void MaxpoolingComponent::InderivPatchesToInderiv(
4740  const CuMatrix<BaseFloat>& in_deriv_patches,
4741  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *in_deriv) const {
4742 
4743  int32 num_pools_x = 1 + (input_x_dim_ - pool_x_size_) / pool_x_step_;
4744  int32 num_pools_y = 1 + (input_y_dim_ - pool_y_size_) / pool_y_step_;
4745  int32 num_pools_z = 1 + (input_z_dim_ - pool_z_size_) / pool_z_step_;
4746 
4747  std::vector<std::vector<int32> > reverse_column_map(in_deriv->NumCols());
4748  int32 rev_col_map_size = reverse_column_map.size();
4749  for (int32 x = 0, index = 0; x < pool_x_size_; x++) {
4750  for (int32 y = 0; y < pool_y_size_; y++) {
4751  for (int32 z = 0; z < pool_z_size_; z++) {
4752 
4753  for (int32 x_pool = 0; x_pool < num_pools_x; x_pool++) {
4754  for (int32 y_pool = 0; y_pool < num_pools_y; y_pool++) {
4755  for (int32 z_pool = 0; z_pool < num_pools_z; z_pool++, index++) {
4756  int32 vector_index = (x_pool * pool_x_step_ + x) * input_y_dim_ * input_z_dim_ +
4757  (y_pool * pool_y_step_ + y) * input_z_dim_ +
4758  (z_pool * pool_z_step_ + z);
4759 
4760  KALDI_ASSERT(vector_index < rev_col_map_size);
4761  reverse_column_map[vector_index].push_back(index);
4762  }
4763  }
4764  }
4765  }
4766  }
4767  }
4768  std::vector<std::vector<int32> > rearranged_column_map;
4769  RearrangeIndexes(reverse_column_map, &rearranged_column_map);
4770  for (int32 p = 0; p < rearranged_column_map.size(); p++) {
4771  CuArray<int32> cu_cols(rearranged_column_map[p]);
4772  in_deriv->AddCols(in_deriv_patches, cu_cols);
4773  }
4774 }
4775 
4776 /*
4777  3d max pooling backpropagate function
4778  This function backpropagate the error from
4779  out_deriv to in_deriv.
4780  In order to select the node in each pool to
4781  backpropagate the error, it has to compare
4782  the output pool value stored in the out_value
4783  matrix with each of its input pool member node
4784  stroed in the in_value matrix.
4785 */
4786 void MaxpoolingComponent::Backprop(const std::string &debug_info,
4787  const ComponentPrecomputedIndexes *indexes,
4788  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in_value,
4789  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_value,
4790  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_deriv,
4791  void *memo,
4792  Component *, // to_update,
4793  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *in_deriv) const {
4794  if (!in_deriv)
4795  return;
4796 
4797  int32 num_frames = in_value.NumRows();
4798  int32 num_pools = OutputDim();
4799  int32 pool_size = pool_x_size_ * pool_y_size_ * pool_z_size_;
4800  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> patches(num_frames, num_pools * pool_size, kUndefined);
4801  InputToInputPatches(in_value, &patches);
4802 
4803  for (int32 q = 0; q < pool_size; q++) {
4804  // zero-out mask
4805  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> mask;
4806  out_value.EqualElementMask(patches.ColRange(q * num_pools, num_pools), &mask);
4807  mask.MulElements(out_deriv);
4808  patches.ColRange(q * num_pools, num_pools).CopyFromMat(mask);
4809  }
4810 
4811  // combine the derivatives from the individual input deriv patches
4812  // to compute input deriv matrix
4813  InderivPatchesToInderiv(patches, in_deriv);
4814 }
4815 
4816 void MaxpoolingComponent::Read(std::istream &is, bool binary) {
4817  ExpectOneOrTwoTokens(is, binary, "<MaxpoolingComponent>", "<InputXDim>");
4818  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &input_x_dim_);
4819  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<InputYDim>");
4820  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &input_y_dim_);
4821  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<InputZDim>");
4822  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &input_z_dim_);
4823  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<PoolXSize>");
4824  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &pool_x_size_);
4825  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<PoolYSize>");
4826  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &pool_y_size_);
4827  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<PoolZSize>");
4828  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &pool_z_size_);
4829  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<PoolXStep>");
4830  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &pool_x_step_);
4831  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<PoolYStep>");
4832  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &pool_y_step_);
4833  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<PoolZStep>");
4834  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &pool_z_step_);
4835  ExpectToken(is, binary, "</MaxpoolingComponent>");
4836  Check();
4837 }
4838 
4839 void MaxpoolingComponent::Write(std::ostream &os, bool binary) const {
4840  WriteToken(os, binary, "<MaxpoolingComponent>");
4841  WriteToken(os, binary, "<InputXDim>");
4842  WriteBasicType(os, binary, input_x_dim_);
4843  WriteToken(os, binary, "<InputYDim>");
4844  WriteBasicType(os, binary, input_y_dim_);
4845  WriteToken(os, binary, "<InputZDim>");
4846  WriteBasicType(os, binary, input_z_dim_);
4847  WriteToken(os, binary, "<PoolXSize>");
4848  WriteBasicType(os, binary, pool_x_size_);
4849  WriteToken(os, binary, "<PoolYSize>");
4850  WriteBasicType(os, binary, pool_y_size_);
4851  WriteToken(os, binary, "<PoolZSize>");
4852  WriteBasicType(os, binary, pool_z_size_);
4853  WriteToken(os, binary, "<PoolXStep>");
4854  WriteBasicType(os, binary, pool_x_step_);
4855  WriteToken(os, binary, "<PoolYStep>");
4856  WriteBasicType(os, binary, pool_y_step_);
4857  WriteToken(os, binary, "<PoolZStep>");
4858  WriteBasicType(os, binary, pool_z_step_);
4859  WriteToken(os, binary, "</MaxpoolingComponent>");
4860 }
4861 
4862 // display information about component
4863 std::string MaxpoolingComponent::Info() const {
4864  std::ostringstream stream;
4865  stream << Type()
4866  << ", input-x-dim=" << input_x_dim_
4867  << ", input-y-dim=" << input_y_dim_
4868  << ", input-z-dim=" << input_z_dim_
4869  << ", pool-x-size=" << pool_x_size_
4870  << ", pool-y-size=" << pool_y_size_
4871  << ", pool-z-size=" << pool_z_size_
4872  << ", pool-x-step=" << pool_x_step_
4873  << ", pool-y-step=" << pool_y_step_
4874  << ", pool-z-step=" << pool_z_step_;
4875  return stream.str();
4876 }
4877 
4878 void PermuteComponent::ComputeReverseColumnMap() {
4879  int32 dim = column_map_.Dim();
4880  KALDI_ASSERT(dim > 0);
4881  std::vector<int32> reverse_column_map_cpu(dim, -1),
4882  column_map_cpu(dim);
4883  column_map_.CopyToVec(&column_map_cpu);
4884  for (int32 i = 0; i < dim; i++) {
4885  int32 &dest = reverse_column_map_cpu[column_map_cpu[i]];
4886  if (dest != -1)
4887  KALDI_ERR << "Column map does not represent a permutation.";
4888  dest = i;
4889  }
4890  reverse_column_map_.Resize(dim);
4891  reverse_column_map_.CopyFromVec(reverse_column_map_cpu);
4892 }
4893 
4894 Component* PermuteComponent::Copy() const {
4895  PermuteComponent *ans = new PermuteComponent();
4896  ans->column_map_ = column_map_;
4897  ans->reverse_column_map_ = reverse_column_map_;
4898  return ans;
4899 }
4900 
4901 void* PermuteComponent::Propagate(const ComponentPrecomputedIndexes *indexes,
4902  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in,
4903  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *out) const {
4904  out->CopyCols(in, column_map_);
4905  return NULL;
4906 }
4907 void PermuteComponent::Backprop(const std::string &debug_info,
4908  const ComponentPrecomputedIndexes *indexes,
4909  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &, //in_value
4910  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &, // out_value,
4911  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_deriv,
4912  void *memo,
4913  Component *to_update,
4914  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *in_deriv) const {
4915  in_deriv->CopyCols(out_deriv, reverse_column_map_);
4916 }
4917 
4918 void PermuteComponent::InitFromConfig(ConfigLine *cfl) {
4919  bool ok = true;
4920  std::string column_map_str;
4921  ok = ok && cfl->GetValue("column-map", &column_map_str);
4922  std::vector<int32> column_map;
4923  if (!SplitStringToIntegers(column_map_str, ",", true, &column_map))
4924  KALDI_ERR << "Bad initializer in PermuteComponent: column-map="
4925  << column_map_str;
4926  if (cfl->HasUnusedValues())
4927  KALDI_ERR << "Could not process these elements in initializer: "
4928  << cfl->UnusedValues();
4929  if (!ok)
4930  KALDI_ERR << "Invalid initializer for layer of type "
4931  << Type() << ": \"" << cfl->WholeLine() << "\"";
4932  Init(column_map);
4933 }
4934 
4935 void PermuteComponent::Init(const std::vector<int32> &column_map) {
4936  KALDI_ASSERT(column_map.size() > 0);
4937  column_map_.CopyFromVec(column_map);
4938  ComputeReverseColumnMap();
4939 }
4940 
4941 void PermuteComponent::Read(std::istream &is, bool binary) {
4942  ExpectOneOrTwoTokens(is, binary, "<PermuteComponent>", "<ColumnMap>");
4943  std::vector<int32> column_map;
4944  if (binary && is.peek() == 'F') {
4945  // back-compatibility code [temporary]
4946  Vector<BaseFloat> float_map;
4947  float_map.Read(is, binary);
4948  column_map.resize(float_map.Dim());
4949  for (int32 i = 0; i < float_map.Dim(); i++) {
4950  // note: casting truncates toward zero: add 0.5 to approximate rounding.
4951  column_map[i] = static_cast<int32>(float_map(i) + 0.5);
4952  }
4953  // the next line is a workaround for a bug in the old
4954  // writing code, which now causes an assert failure. it's only
4955  // valid for the permutations we're currently using. anyway all this
4956  // code is only temporary.
4957  column_map.back() = float_map.Dim() - 1;
4958  } else {
4959  ReadIntegerVector(is, binary, &column_map);
4960  }
4961  column_map_.CopyFromVec(column_map);
4962  ExpectToken(is, binary, "</PermuteComponent>");
4963  ComputeReverseColumnMap();
4964 }
4965 
4966 void PermuteComponent::Write(std::ostream &os, bool binary) const {
4967  WriteToken(os, binary, "<PermuteComponent>");
4968  WriteToken(os, binary, "<ColumnMap>");
4969  std::ostringstream buffer;
4970  std::vector<int32> column_map;
4971  column_map_.CopyToVec(&column_map);
4972  WriteIntegerVector(os, binary, column_map);
4973  WriteToken(os, binary, "</PermuteComponent>");
4974 }
4975 
4976 std::string PermuteComponent::Info() const {
4977  std::ostringstream stream;
4978  stream << Type() << ", dim=" << column_map_.Dim();
4979  stream << " , column-map=[ ";
4980  std::vector<int32> column_map(column_map_.Dim());
4981  column_map_.CopyToVec(&column_map);
4982  int32 max_size = 5;
4983  for (size_t i = 0; i < column_map.size() && i < max_size; i++)
4984  stream << column_map[i] << ' ';
4985  if (static_cast<int32>(column_map.size()) > max_size)
4986  stream << "... ";
4987  stream << "]";
4988  return stream.str();
4989 }
4990 
4991 
4992 bool CompositeComponent::IsUpdatable() const {
4993  for (std::vector<Component*>::const_iterator iter = components_.begin(),
4994  end = components_.end(); iter != end; ++iter)
4995  if (((*iter)->Properties() & kUpdatableComponent) != 0)
4996  return true;
4997  return false;
4998 }
4999 
5000 // virtual
5001 int32 CompositeComponent::InputDim() const {
5002  KALDI_ASSERT(!components_.empty());
5003  return components_.front()->InputDim();
5004 };
5005 
5006 // virtual
5007 int32 CompositeComponent::OutputDim() const {
5008  KALDI_ASSERT(!components_.empty());
5009  return components_.back()->OutputDim();
5010 };
5011 
5012 // virtual
5013 int32 CompositeComponent::Properties() const {
5014  KALDI_ASSERT(!components_.empty());
5015  int32 last_component_properties = components_.back()->Properties(),
5016  first_component_properties = components_.front()->Properties();
5017  // We always assume backprop needs the input, as this would be necessary to
5018  // get the activations at intermediate layers, if these were not needed in
5019  // backprop, there would be no reason to use a CompositeComponent.
5020  int32 ans = kSimpleComponent | kBackpropNeedsInput |
5021  (last_component_properties &
5022  (kPropagateAdds|kBackpropNeedsOutput|kOutputContiguous)) |
5023  (first_component_properties &
5024  (kBackpropAdds|kInputContiguous)) |
5025  (IsUpdatable() ? kUpdatableComponent : 0);
5026  // note, we don't return the kStoresStats property because that function is
5027  // not implemented; instead, for efficiency, we call StoreStats() on any
5028  // sub-components as part of the backprop phase.
5029  if (last_component_properties & kStoresStats)
5030  ans |= kBackpropNeedsOutput;
5031  return ans;
5032 };
5033 
5034 
5035 MatrixStrideType CompositeComponent::GetStrideType(int32 i) const {
5036  int32 num_components = components_.size();
5037  if ((components_[i]->Properties() & kOutputContiguous) ||
5038  (i + 1 < num_components &&
5039  (components_[i + 1]->Properties() & kInputContiguous)))
5040  return kStrideEqualNumCols;
5041  else
5042  return kDefaultStride;
5043 }
5044 
5045 
5046 // virtual
5047 void* CompositeComponent::Propagate(
5048  const ComponentPrecomputedIndexes *, // indexes
5049  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in,
5050  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *out) const {
5051  KALDI_ASSERT(in.NumRows() == out->NumRows() && in.NumCols() == InputDim() &&
5052  out->NumCols() == OutputDim());
5053  int32 num_rows = in.NumRows(),
5054  num_components = components_.size();
5055  if (max_rows_process_ > 0 && num_rows > max_rows_process_) {
5056  // recurse and process smaller parts of the data, to save memory.
5057  for (int32 row_offset = 0; row_offset < num_rows;
5058  row_offset += max_rows_process_) {
5059  int32 this_num_rows = std::min<int32>(max_rows_process_,
5060  num_rows - row_offset);
5061  const CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat> in_part(in, row_offset, this_num_rows,
5062  0, in.NumCols());
5063  CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat> out_part(*out, row_offset, this_num_rows,
5064  0, out->NumCols());
5065  this->Propagate(NULL, in_part, &out_part);
5066  }
5067  return NULL;
5068  }
5069  std::vector<CuMatrix<BaseFloat> > intermediate_outputs(num_components - 1);
5070  for (int32 i = 0; i < num_components; i++) {
5071  if (i + 1 < num_components) {
5072  MatrixResizeType resize_type =
5073  ((components_[i]->Properties() & kPropagateAdds) ?
5074  kSetZero : kUndefined);
5075  intermediate_outputs[i].Resize(num_rows, components_[i]->OutputDim(),
5076  resize_type, GetStrideType(i));
5077  }
5078  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &this_in = (i == 0 ? in :
5079  intermediate_outputs[i-1]);
5080  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *this_out = (i + 1 == num_components ?
5081  out : &(intermediate_outputs[i]));
5082  void *memo = components_[i]->Propagate(NULL, this_in, this_out);
5083  // we'll re-do the forward propagation in the backprop, and we can
5084  // regenerate any memos there, so no need to keep them.
5085  if (memo != NULL)
5086  components_[i]->DeleteMemo(memo);
5087  if (i > 0)
5088  intermediate_outputs[i-1].Resize(0, 0);
5089  }
5090  return NULL;
5091 }
5092 
5093 
5094 void CompositeComponent::Init(const std::vector<Component*> &components,
5095  int32 max_rows_process) {
5096  DeletePointers(&components_); // clean up.
5097  components_ = components;
5098  KALDI_ASSERT(!components.empty());
5099  max_rows_process_ = max_rows_process;
5100 
5101  for (size_t i = 0; i < components_.size(); i++) {
5102  // make sure all constituent components are simple.
5103  KALDI_ASSERT(components_[i]->Properties() & kSimpleComponent);
5104  if (i > 0) {
5105  // make sure all the internal dimensions match up.
5106  KALDI_ASSERT(components_[i]->InputDim() ==
5107  components_[i-1]->OutputDim());
5108  }
5109  }
5110 }
5111 
5112 // virtual
5113 void CompositeComponent::Read(std::istream &is, bool binary) {
5114  // Because we didn't previously write out the learning rate,
5115  // we need some temporary code.
5116  int32 max_rows_process;
5117  if (false) {
5118  ReadUpdatableCommon(is, binary);
5119  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<MaxRowsProcess>");
5120  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &max_rows_process);
5121  } else { // temporary code.
5122  std::string token;
5123  ReadToken(is, binary, &token);
5124  if (token == "<CompositeComponent>") {
5125  // if the first token is the opening tag, then
5126  // ignore it and get the next tag.
5127  ReadToken(is, binary, &token);
5128  }
5129  if (token == "<LearningRateFactor>") {
5130  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &learning_rate_factor_);
5131  ReadToken(is, binary, &token);
5132  } else {
5133  learning_rate_factor_ = 1.0;
5134  }
5135  if (token == "<IsGradient>") {
5136  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &is_gradient_);
5137  ReadToken(is, binary, &token);
5138  } else {
5139  is_gradient_ = false;
5140  }
5141  if (token == "<LearningRate>") {
5142  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &learning_rate_);
5143  ReadToken(is, binary, &token);
5144  }
5145  if (token != "<MaxRowsProcess>") {
5146  KALDI_ERR << "Expected token <MaxRowsProcess>, got "
5147  << token;
5148  }
5149  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &max_rows_process);
5150  }
5151  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<NumComponents>");
5152  int32 num_components;
5153  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &num_components); // Read dimension.
5154  if (num_components < 0 || num_components > 100000)
5155  KALDI_ERR << "Bad num-components";
5156  std::vector<Component*> components(num_components);
5157  for (int32 i = 0; i < num_components; i++)
5158  components[i] = ReadNew(is, binary);
5159  Init(components, max_rows_process);
5160  ExpectToken(is, binary, "</CompositeComponent>");
5161 }
5162 
5163 // virtual
5164 void CompositeComponent::ZeroStats() {
5165  // we call ZeroStats() on all components without checking their flags; this
5166  // will do nothing if the component doesn't store stats. (components like
5167  // ReLU and sigmoid and tanh store stats on activations).
5168  for (size_t i = 0; i < components_.size(); i++)
5169  components_[i]->ZeroStats();
5170 }
5171 
5172 // virtual
5173 void CompositeComponent::Write(std::ostream &os, bool binary) const {
5174  WriteUpdatableCommon(os, binary); // Write opening tag and learning rate.
5175  WriteToken(os, binary, "<MaxRowsProcess>");
5176  WriteBasicType(os, binary, max_rows_process_);
5177  WriteToken(os, binary, "<NumComponents>");
5178  int32 num_components = components_.size();
5179  WriteBasicType(os, binary, num_components);
5180  for (int32 i = 0; i < num_components; i++)
5181  components_[i]->Write(os, binary);
5182  WriteToken(os, binary, "</CompositeComponent>");
5183 }
5184 
5185 
5186 // virtual
5187 void CompositeComponent::Backprop(const std::string &debug_info,
5188  const ComponentPrecomputedIndexes *indexes,
5189  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in_value,
5190  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_value,
5191  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_deriv,
5192  void *memo,
5193  Component *to_update,
5194  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *in_deriv) const {
5195  KALDI_ASSERT(in_value.NumRows() == out_deriv.NumRows() &&
5196  in_value.NumCols() == InputDim() &&
5197  out_deriv.NumCols() == OutputDim());
5198  int32 num_rows = in_value.NumRows(),
5199  num_components = components_.size();
5200  if (max_rows_process_ > 0 && num_rows > max_rows_process_) {
5201  KALDI_ASSERT(max_rows_process_ > 0);
5202  // recurse and process smaller parts of the data, to save memory.
5203  for (int32 row_offset = 0; row_offset < num_rows;
5204  row_offset += max_rows_process_) {
5205  bool have_output_value = (out_value.NumRows() != 0);
5206  int32 this_num_rows = std::min<int32>(max_rows_process_,
5207  num_rows - row_offset);
5208  // out_value_part will only be used if out_value is nonempty; otherwise we
5209  // make it a submatrix of 'out_deriv' to avoid errors in the constructor.
5210  const CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat> out_value_part(have_output_value ? out_value : out_deriv,
5211  row_offset, this_num_rows,
5212  0, out_deriv.NumCols());
5213  // in_deriv_value_part will only be used if in_deriv != NULL; otherwise we
5214  // make it a submatrix of 'in_value' to avoid errors in the constructor.
5215  CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat> in_deriv_part(in_deriv != NULL ? *in_deriv : in_value,
5216  row_offset, this_num_rows,
5217  0, in_value.NumCols());
5218  CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat> in_value_part(in_value, row_offset, this_num_rows,
5219  0, in_value.NumCols());
5220  const CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat> out_deriv_part(out_deriv,
5221  row_offset, this_num_rows,
5222  0, out_deriv.NumCols());
5223  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> empty_mat;
5224  this->Backprop(debug_info, NULL, in_value_part,
5225  (have_output_value ? static_cast<const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat>&>(out_value_part) :
5226  static_cast<const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat>&>(empty_mat)),
5227  out_deriv_part, NULL, to_update,
5228  in_deriv != NULL ? &in_deriv_part : NULL);
5229  }
5230  return;
5231  }
5232  // For now, assume all intermediate values and derivatives need to be
5233  // computed. in_value and out_deriv will always be supplied.
5234 
5235  // intermediate_outputs[i] contains the output of component i.
5236  std::vector<CuMatrix<BaseFloat> > intermediate_outputs(num_components);
5237  // intermediate_derivs[i] contains the deriative at the output of component i.
5238  std::vector<CuMatrix<BaseFloat> > intermediate_derivs(num_components - 1);
5239 
5240  KALDI_ASSERT(memo == NULL);
5241  // note: only a very few components use memos, but we need to support them.
5242  std::vector<void*> memos(num_components, NULL);
5243 
5244  int32 num_components_to_propagate = num_components;
5245  if (!(components_[num_components - 1]->Properties() & kUsesMemo)) {
5246  // we only need to propagate the very last component if it uses a memo.
5247  num_components_to_propagate--;
5248  if (num_components > 1) {
5249  // skip the last-but-one component's propagate if the last component's
5250  // backprop doesn't need the input and the last-but-one component's
5251  // backprop doesn't need the output. This is the lowest hanging fruit for
5252  // optimization; other propagates might also be skippable.
5253  int32 properties = components_[num_components - 2]->Properties(),
5254  next_properties = components_[num_components - 1]->Properties();
5255  if (!(properties & (kBackpropNeedsOutput || kUsesMemo)) &&
5256  !(next_properties & kBackpropNeedsInput)) {
5257  num_components_to_propagate--;
5258  }
5259  }
5260  }
5261 
5262 
5263  // Do the propagation again.
5264  for (int32 i = 0; i < num_components_to_propagate; i++) {
5265  MatrixResizeType resize_type =
5266  ((components_[i]->Properties() & kPropagateAdds) ?
5267  kSetZero : kUndefined);
5268  intermediate_outputs[i].Resize(num_rows, components_[i]->OutputDim(),
5269  resize_type, GetStrideType(i));
5270  memos[i] =
5271  components_[i]->Propagate(NULL,
5272  (i == 0 ? in_value : intermediate_outputs[i-1]),
5273  &(intermediate_outputs[i]));
5274  }
5275 
5276  for (int32 i = num_components - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
5277  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &this_in_value =
5278  (i == 0 ? in_value : intermediate_outputs[i-1]),
5279  &this_out_value =
5280  (i == num_components - 1 ? out_value : intermediate_outputs[i]);
5281 
5282  Component *component_to_update =
5283  (to_update == NULL ? NULL :
5284  dynamic_cast<CompositeComponent*>(to_update)->components_[i]);
5285 
5286  if (component_to_update != NULL &&
5287  components_[i]->Properties() & kStoresStats)
5288  component_to_update->StoreStats(this_in_value, this_out_value, memos[i]);
5289 
5290  if (i > 0) {
5291  MatrixResizeType resize_type =
5292  ((components_[i]->Properties() & kBackpropAdds) ?
5293  kSetZero : kUndefined);
5294  intermediate_derivs[i-1].Resize(num_rows, components_[i]->InputDim(),
5295  resize_type, GetStrideType(i - 1));
5296  }
5297  // skip the first component's backprop if it's not updatable and in_deriv is
5298  // not requested. Again, this is the lowest-hanging fruit to optimize.
5299  if (!(i == 0 && !(components_[0]->Properties() & kUpdatableComponent) &&
5300  in_deriv == NULL)) {
5301  components_[i]->Backprop(debug_info, NULL,
5302  this_in_value, this_out_value,
5303  (i + 1 == num_components ? out_deriv : intermediate_derivs[i]),
5304  memos[i], component_to_update,
5305  (i == 0 ? in_deriv : &(intermediate_derivs[i-1])));
5306  }
5307  if (memos[i] != NULL)
5308  components_[i]->DeleteMemo(memos[i]);
5309  }
5310 }
5311 
5312 
5313 // virtual
5314 std::string CompositeComponent::Info() const {
5315  std::ostringstream stream;
5316  stream << Type() << " ";
5317  for (size_t i = 0; i < components_.size(); i++) {
5318  if (i > 0) stream << ", ";
5319  stream << "sub-component" << (i+1) << " = { "
5320  << components_[i]->Info() << " }";
5321  }
5322  return stream.str();
5323 }
5324 
5325 // virtual
5326 void CompositeComponent::Scale(BaseFloat scale) {
5327  for (size_t i = 0; i < components_.size(); i++)
5328  components_[i]->Scale(scale);
5329 }
5330 
5331 // virtual
5332 void CompositeComponent::Add(BaseFloat alpha, const Component &other_in) {
5333  const CompositeComponent *other = dynamic_cast<const CompositeComponent*>(
5334  &other_in);
5335  KALDI_ASSERT(other != NULL && other->components_.size() ==
5336  components_.size() && "Mismatching nnet topologies");
5337  for (size_t i = 0; i < components_.size(); i++)
5338  components_[i]->Add(alpha, *(other->components_[i]));
5339 }
5340 
5341 // virtual
5342 void CompositeComponent::PerturbParams(BaseFloat stddev) {
5343  KALDI_ASSERT(this->IsUpdatable()); // or should not be called.
5344  for (size_t i = 0; i < components_.size(); i++) {
5345  if (components_[i]->Properties() & kUpdatableComponent) {
5346  UpdatableComponent *uc =
5347  dynamic_cast<UpdatableComponent*>(components_[i]);
5348  uc->PerturbParams(stddev);
5349  }
5350  }
5351 }
5352 
5353 void CompositeComponent::SetUnderlyingLearningRate(BaseFloat lrate) {
5354  KALDI_ASSERT(this->IsUpdatable()); // or should not be called.
5355  UpdatableComponent::SetUnderlyingLearningRate(lrate);
5356 
5357  // apply any learning-rate-factor that's set at this level (ill-advised, but
5358  // we'll do it.)
5359  BaseFloat effective_lrate = LearningRate();
5360  for (size_t i = 0; i < components_.size(); i++) {
5361  if (components_[i]->Properties() & kUpdatableComponent) {
5362  UpdatableComponent *uc =
5363  dynamic_cast<UpdatableComponent*>(components_[i]);
5364  uc->SetUnderlyingLearningRate(effective_lrate);
5365  }
5366  }
5367 }
5368 
5369 void CompositeComponent::SetActualLearningRate(BaseFloat lrate) {
5370  KALDI_ASSERT(this->IsUpdatable()); // or should not be called.
5371  UpdatableComponent::SetActualLearningRate(lrate);
5372  for (size_t i = 0; i < components_.size(); i++) {
5373  if (components_[i]->Properties() & kUpdatableComponent) {
5374  UpdatableComponent *uc =
5375  dynamic_cast<UpdatableComponent*>(components_[i]);
5376  uc->SetActualLearningRate(lrate);
5377  }
5378  }
5379 }
5380 
5381 // virtual
5382 void CompositeComponent::SetAsGradient() {
5383  KALDI_ASSERT(this->IsUpdatable()); // or should not be called.
5384  UpdatableComponent::SetAsGradient();
5385  for (size_t i = 0; i < components_.size(); i++) {
5386  if (components_[i]->Properties() & kUpdatableComponent) {
5387  UpdatableComponent *uc =
5388  dynamic_cast<UpdatableComponent*>(components_[i]);
5389  uc->SetAsGradient();
5390  }
5391  }
5392 }
5393 
5394 // virtual
5395 int32 CompositeComponent::NumParameters() const {
5396  KALDI_ASSERT(this->IsUpdatable()); // or should not be called.
5397  int32 ans = 0;
5398  for (size_t i = 0; i < components_.size(); i++) {
5399  if (components_[i]->Properties() & kUpdatableComponent) {
5400  UpdatableComponent *uc =
5401  dynamic_cast<UpdatableComponent*>(components_[i]);
5402  ans += uc->NumParameters();
5403  }
5404  }
5405  return ans;
5406 }
5407 
5408 // virtual
5409 void CompositeComponent::Vectorize(VectorBase<BaseFloat> *params) const {
5410  int32 cur_offset = 0;
5411  KALDI_ASSERT(this->IsUpdatable()); // or should not be called.
5412  for (size_t i = 0; i < components_.size(); i++) {
5413  if (components_[i]->Properties() & kUpdatableComponent) {
5414  UpdatableComponent *uc =
5415  dynamic_cast<UpdatableComponent*>(components_[i]);
5416  int32 this_size = uc->NumParameters();
5417  SubVector<BaseFloat> params_range(*params, cur_offset, this_size);
5418  uc->Vectorize(&params_range);
5419  cur_offset += this_size;
5420  }
5421  }
5422  KALDI_ASSERT(cur_offset == params->Dim());
5423 }
5424 
5425 // virtual
5426 void CompositeComponent::UnVectorize(const VectorBase<BaseFloat> &params) {
5427  int32 cur_offset = 0;
5428  KALDI_ASSERT(this->IsUpdatable()); // or should not be called.
5429  for (size_t i = 0; i < components_.size(); i++) {
5430  if (components_[i]->Properties() & kUpdatableComponent) {
5431  UpdatableComponent *uc =
5432  dynamic_cast<UpdatableComponent*>(components_[i]);
5433  int32 this_size = uc->NumParameters();
5434  SubVector<BaseFloat> params_range(params, cur_offset, this_size);
5435  uc->UnVectorize(params_range);
5436  cur_offset += this_size;
5437  }
5438  }
5439  KALDI_ASSERT(cur_offset == params.Dim());
5440 }
5441 
5442 // virtual
5443 BaseFloat CompositeComponent::DotProduct(
5444  const UpdatableComponent &other_in) const {
5445  const CompositeComponent *other = dynamic_cast<const CompositeComponent*>(
5446  &other_in);
5447  KALDI_ASSERT(other != NULL && other->components_.size() ==
5448  components_.size() && "Mismatching nnet topologies");
5449  BaseFloat ans = 0.0;
5450  for (size_t i = 0.0; i < components_.size(); i++) {
5451  if (components_[i]->Properties() & kUpdatableComponent) {
5452  UpdatableComponent *uc =
5453  dynamic_cast<UpdatableComponent*>(components_[i]);
5454  const UpdatableComponent *uc_other =
5455  dynamic_cast<UpdatableComponent*>(other->components_[i]);
5456  KALDI_ASSERT(uc != NULL && uc_other != NULL);
5457  ans += uc->DotProduct(*uc_other);
5458  }
5459  }
5460  return ans;
5461 }
5462 
5464 void CompositeComponent::FreezeNaturalGradient(bool freeze) {
5465  for (size_t i = 0; i < components_.size(); i++) {
5466  if (components_[i]->Properties() & kUpdatableComponent) {
5467  UpdatableComponent *uc =
5468  dynamic_cast<UpdatableComponent*>(components_[i]);
5469  KALDI_ASSERT(uc != NULL);
5470  uc->FreezeNaturalGradient(freeze);
5471  }
5472  }
5473 }
5474 
5475 // virtual
5476 Component* CompositeComponent::Copy() const {
5477  std::vector<Component*> components(components_.size());
5478  for (size_t i = 0; i < components_.size(); i++)
5479  components[i] = components_[i]->Copy();
5480  CompositeComponent *ans = new CompositeComponent();
5481  ans->Init(components, max_rows_process_);
5482  return ans;
5483 }
5484 
5485 
5486 // virtual
5487 void CompositeComponent::InitFromConfig(ConfigLine *cfl) {
5488  int32 max_rows_process = 4096, num_components = -1;
5489  cfl->GetValue("max-rows-process", &max_rows_process);
5490  if (!cfl->GetValue("num-components", &num_components) ||
5491  num_components < 1)
5492  KALDI_ERR << "Expected num-components to be defined in "
5493  << "CompositeComponent config line '" << cfl->WholeLine() << "'";
5494  std::vector<Component*> components;
5495  for (int32 i = 1; i <= num_components; i++) {
5496  std::ostringstream name_stream;
5497  name_stream << "component" << i;
5498  std::string component_config;
5499  if (!cfl->GetValue(name_stream.str(), &component_config)) {
5500  DeletePointers(&components);
5501  KALDI_ERR << "Expected '" << name_stream.str() << "' to be defined in "
5502  << "CompositeComponent config line '" << cfl->WholeLine() << "'";
5503  }
5504  ConfigLine nested_line;
5505  // note: the nested line may not contain comments.
5506  std::string component_type;
5507  Component *this_component = NULL;
5508  if (!nested_line.ParseLine(component_config) ||
5509  !nested_line.GetValue("type", &component_type) ||
5510  !(this_component = NewComponentOfType(component_type)) ||
5511  nested_line.FirstToken() != "") {
5512  DeletePointers(&components);
5513  KALDI_ERR << "Could not parse config line for '" << name_stream.str()
5514  << "(or undefined or bad component type [type=xxx]), in "
5515  << "CompositeComponent config line '" << cfl->WholeLine() << "'";
5516  }
5517  if(this_component->Type() == "CompositeComponent") {
5518  DeletePointers(&components);
5519  delete this_component;
5520  // This is not allowed. If memory is too much with just one
5521  // CompositeComponent, try decreasing max-rows-process instead.
5522  KALDI_ERR << "Found CompositeComponent nested within CompositeComponent."
5523  << "Nested line: '" << nested_line.WholeLine() << "'\n"
5524  << "Toplevel CompositeComponent line '" << cfl->WholeLine()
5525  << "'";
5526  }
5527  this_component->InitFromConfig(&nested_line);
5528  int32 props = this_component->Properties();
5529  if ((props & kRandomComponent) != 0 ||
5530  (props & kSimpleComponent) == 0) {
5531  KALDI_ERR << "CompositeComponent contains disallowed component type: "
5532  << nested_line.WholeLine();
5533  }
5534  components.push_back(this_component);
5535  }
5536  if (cfl->HasUnusedValues())
5537  KALDI_ERR << "Could not process these elements in initializer: "
5538  << cfl->UnusedValues();
5539  this->Init(components, max_rows_process);
5540 }
5541 
5542 const Component* CompositeComponent::GetComponent(int32 i) const {
5543  KALDI_ASSERT(static_cast<size_t>(i) < components_.size());
5544  return components_[i];
5545 }
5546 
5547 void CompositeComponent::SetComponent(int32 i, Component *component) {
5548  KALDI_ASSERT(static_cast<size_t>(i) < components_.size());
5549  delete components_[i];
5550  components_[i] = component;
5551 }
5552 
5553 int32 LstmNonlinearityComponent::InputDim() const {
5554  int32 cell_dim = value_sum_.NumCols();
5555  return cell_dim * 5 + (use_dropout_ ? 3 : 0);
5556 }
5557 
5558 int32 LstmNonlinearityComponent::OutputDim() const {
5559  int32 cell_dim = value_sum_.NumCols();
5560  return cell_dim * 2;
5561 }
5562 
5563 
5564 void LstmNonlinearityComponent::Read(std::istream &is, bool binary) {
5565  ReadUpdatableCommon(is, binary); // Read opening tag and learning rate.
5566  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<Params>");
5567  params_.Read(is, binary);
5568  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<ValueAvg>");
5569  value_sum_.Read(is, binary);
5570  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<DerivAvg>");
5571  deriv_sum_.Read(is, binary);
5572  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<SelfRepairConfig>");
5573  self_repair_config_.Read(is, binary);
5574  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<SelfRepairProb>");
5575  self_repair_total_.Read(is, binary);
5576 
5577  std::string tok;
5578  ReadToken(is, binary, &tok);
5579  if (tok == "<UseDropout>") {
5580  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &use_dropout_);
5581  ReadToken(is, binary, &tok);
5582  } else {
5583  use_dropout_ = false;
5584  }
5585  KALDI_ASSERT(tok == "<Count>");
5586  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &count_);
5587 
5588  // For the on-disk format, we normalze value_sum_, deriv_sum_ and
5589  // self_repair_total_ by dividing by the count, but in memory they are scaled
5590  // by the count. [for self_repair_total_, the scaling factor is count_ *
5591  // cell_dim].
5592  value_sum_.Scale(count_);
5593  deriv_sum_.Scale(count_);
5594  int32 cell_dim = params_.NumCols();
5595  self_repair_total_.Scale(count_ * cell_dim);
5596 
5597  InitNaturalGradient();
5598 
5599  ExpectToken(is, binary, "</LstmNonlinearityComponent>");
5600 
5601 }
5602 
5603 void LstmNonlinearityComponent::Write(std::ostream &os, bool binary) const {
5604  WriteUpdatableCommon(os, binary); // Read opening tag and learning rate.
5605 
5606  WriteToken(os, binary, "<Params>");
5607  params_.Write(os, binary);
5608  WriteToken(os, binary, "<ValueAvg>");
5609  {
5610  Matrix<BaseFloat> value_avg(value_sum_);
5611  if (count_ != 0.0)
5612  value_avg.Scale(1.0 / count_);
5613  value_avg.Write(os, binary);
5614  }
5615  WriteToken(os, binary, "<DerivAvg>");
5616  {
5617  Matrix<BaseFloat> deriv_avg(deriv_sum_);
5618  if (count_ != 0.0)
5619  deriv_avg.Scale(1.0 / count_);
5620  deriv_avg.Write(os, binary);
5621  }
5622  WriteToken(os, binary, "<SelfRepairConfig>");
5623  self_repair_config_.Write(os, binary);
5624  WriteToken(os, binary, "<SelfRepairProb>");
5625  {
5626  int32 cell_dim = params_.NumCols();
5627  Vector<BaseFloat> self_repair_prob(self_repair_total_);
5628  if (count_ != 0.0)
5629  self_repair_prob.Scale(1.0 / (count_ * cell_dim));
5630  self_repair_prob.Write(os, binary);
5631  }
5632  if (use_dropout_) {
5633  // only write this if true; we have back-compat code in reading anyway.
5634  // this makes the models without dropout easier to read with older code.
5635  WriteToken(os, binary, "<UseDropout>");
5636  WriteBasicType(os, binary, use_dropout_);
5637  }
5638  WriteToken(os, binary, "<Count>");
5639  WriteBasicType(os, binary, count_);
5640  WriteToken(os, binary, "</LstmNonlinearityComponent>");
5641 }
5642 
5643 
5644 
5645 std::string LstmNonlinearityComponent::Info() const {
5646  std::ostringstream stream;
5647  int32 cell_dim = params_.NumCols();
5648  stream << UpdatableComponent::Info() << ", cell-dim=" << cell_dim
5649  << ", use-dropout=" << (use_dropout_ ? "true" : "false");
5650  PrintParameterStats(stream, "w_ic", params_.Row(0));
5651  PrintParameterStats(stream, "w_fc", params_.Row(1));
5652  PrintParameterStats(stream, "w_oc", params_.Row(2));
5653 
5654  // Note: some of the following code mirrors the code in
5655  // UpdatableComponent::Info(), in nnet-component-itf.cc.
5656  if (count_ > 0) {
5657  stream << ", count=" << std::setprecision(3) << count_
5658  << std::setprecision(6);
5659  }
5660  static const char *nonlin_names[] = { "i_t_sigmoid", "f_t_sigmoid", "c_t_tanh",
5661  "o_t_sigmoid", "m_t_tanh" };
5662  for (int32 i = 0; i < 5; i++) {
5663  stream << ", " << nonlin_names[i] << "={";
5664  stream << " self-repair-lower-threshold=" << self_repair_config_(i)
5665  << ", self-repair-scale=" << self_repair_config_(i + 5);
5666 
5667  if (count_ != 0) {
5668  BaseFloat self_repaired_proportion =
5669  self_repair_total_(i) / (count_ * cell_dim);
5670  stream << ", self-repaired-proportion=" << self_repaired_proportion;
5671  Vector<double> value_sum(value_sum_.Row(i)),
5672  deriv_sum(deriv_sum_.Row(i));
5673  Vector<BaseFloat> value_avg(value_sum), deriv_avg(deriv_sum);
5674  value_avg.Scale(1.0 / count_);
5675  deriv_avg.Scale(1.0 / count_);
5676  stream << ", value-avg=" << SummarizeVector(value_avg)
5677  << ", deriv-avg=" << SummarizeVector(deriv_avg);
5678  }
5679  stream << " }";
5680  }
5681  return stream.str();
5682 }
5683 
5684 
5685 Component* LstmNonlinearityComponent::Copy() const {
5686  return new LstmNonlinearityComponent(*this);
5687 }
5688 
5689 void LstmNonlinearityComponent::ZeroStats() {
5690  value_sum_.SetZero();
5691  deriv_sum_.SetZero();
5692  self_repair_total_.SetZero();
5693  count_ = 0.0;
5694 }
5695 
5696 void LstmNonlinearityComponent::Scale(BaseFloat scale) {
5697  if (scale == 0.0) {
5698  params_.SetZero();
5699  value_sum_.SetZero();
5700  deriv_sum_.SetZero();
5701  self_repair_total_.SetZero();
5702  count_ = 0.0;
5703  } else {
5704  params_.Scale(scale);
5705  value_sum_.Scale(scale);
5706  deriv_sum_.Scale(scale);
5707  self_repair_total_.Scale(scale);
5708  count_ *= scale;
5709  }
5710 }
5711 
5712 void LstmNonlinearityComponent::Add(BaseFloat alpha,
5713  const Component &other_in) {
5714  const LstmNonlinearityComponent *other =
5715  dynamic_cast<const LstmNonlinearityComponent*>(&other_in);
5716  KALDI_ASSERT(other != NULL);
5717  params_.AddMat(alpha, other->params_);
5718  value_sum_.AddMat(alpha, other->value_sum_);
5719  deriv_sum_.AddMat(alpha, other->deriv_sum_);
5720  self_repair_total_.AddVec(alpha, other->self_repair_total_);
5721  count_ += alpha * other->count_;
5722 }
5723 
5724 void LstmNonlinearityComponent::PerturbParams(BaseFloat stddev) {
5725  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> temp_params(params_.NumRows(), params_.NumCols());
5726  temp_params.SetRandn();
5727  params_.AddMat(stddev, temp_params);
5728 }
5729 
5730 BaseFloat LstmNonlinearityComponent::DotProduct(
5731  const UpdatableComponent &other_in) const {
5732  const LstmNonlinearityComponent *other =
5733  dynamic_cast<const LstmNonlinearityComponent*>(&other_in);
5734  KALDI_ASSERT(other != NULL);
5735  return TraceMatMat(params_, other->params_, kTrans);
5736 }
5737 
5738 int32 LstmNonlinearityComponent::NumParameters() const {
5739  return params_.NumRows() * params_.NumCols();
5740 }
5741 
5742 void LstmNonlinearityComponent::Vectorize(VectorBase<BaseFloat> *params) const {
5743  KALDI_ASSERT(params->Dim() == NumParameters());
5744  params->CopyRowsFromMat(params_);
5745 }
5746 
5747 
5748 void LstmNonlinearityComponent::UnVectorize(
5749  const VectorBase<BaseFloat> &params) {
5750  KALDI_ASSERT(params.Dim() == NumParameters());
5751  params_.CopyRowsFromVec(params);
5752 }
5753 
5754 
5755 void* LstmNonlinearityComponent::Propagate(
5756  const ComponentPrecomputedIndexes *, // indexes
5757  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in,
5758  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *out) const {
5759  cu::ComputeLstmNonlinearity(in, params_, out);
5760  return NULL;
5761 }
5762 
5763 
5764 void LstmNonlinearityComponent::Backprop(
5765  const std::string &debug_info,
5766  const ComponentPrecomputedIndexes *indexes,
5767  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in_value,
5768  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &, // out_value,
5769  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_deriv,
5770  void *memo,
5771  Component *to_update_in,
5772  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *in_deriv) const {
5773 
5774  if (to_update_in == NULL) {
5775  cu::BackpropLstmNonlinearity(in_value, params_, out_deriv,
5776  deriv_sum_, self_repair_config_,
5777  count_, in_deriv,
5778  (CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat>*) NULL,
5779  (CuMatrixBase<double>*) NULL,
5780  (CuMatrixBase<double>*) NULL,
5781  (CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat>*) NULL);
5782  } else {
5783  LstmNonlinearityComponent *to_update =
5784  dynamic_cast<LstmNonlinearityComponent*>(to_update_in);
5785  KALDI_ASSERT(to_update != NULL);
5786 
5787  int32 cell_dim = params_.NumCols();
5788  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> params_deriv(3, cell_dim, kUndefined);
5789  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> self_repair_total(5, cell_dim, kUndefined);
5790 
5791  cu::BackpropLstmNonlinearity(in_value, params_, out_deriv,
5792  deriv_sum_, self_repair_config_,
5793  count_, in_deriv, &params_deriv,
5794  &(to_update->value_sum_),
5795  &(to_update->deriv_sum_),
5796  &self_repair_total);
5797 
5798  CuVector<BaseFloat> self_repair_total_sum(5);
5799  self_repair_total_sum.AddColSumMat(1.0, self_repair_total, 0.0);
5800  to_update->self_repair_total_.AddVec(1.0, self_repair_total_sum);
5801  to_update->count_ += static_cast<double>(in_value.NumRows());
5802 
5803  BaseFloat scale = 1.0;
5804  if (!to_update->is_gradient_) {
5805  to_update->preconditioner_.PreconditionDirections(
5806  &params_deriv, &scale);
5807  }
5808  to_update->params_.AddMat(to_update->learning_rate_ * scale,
5809  params_deriv);
5810  }
5811 }
5812 
5813 LstmNonlinearityComponent::LstmNonlinearityComponent(
5814  const LstmNonlinearityComponent &other):
5815  UpdatableComponent(other),
5816  params_(other.params_),
5817  use_dropout_(other.use_dropout_),
5818  value_sum_(other.value_sum_),
5819  deriv_sum_(other.deriv_sum_),
5820  self_repair_config_(other.self_repair_config_),
5821  self_repair_total_(other.self_repair_total_),
5822  count_(other.count_),
5823  preconditioner_(other.preconditioner_) { }
5824 
5825 void LstmNonlinearityComponent::Init(
5826  int32 cell_dim, bool use_dropout,
5827  BaseFloat param_stddev,
5828  BaseFloat tanh_self_repair_threshold,
5829  BaseFloat sigmoid_self_repair_threshold,
5830  BaseFloat self_repair_scale) {
5831  KALDI_ASSERT(cell_dim > 0 && param_stddev >= 0.0 &&
5832  tanh_self_repair_threshold >= 0.0 &&
5833  tanh_self_repair_threshold <= 1.0 &&
5834  sigmoid_self_repair_threshold >= 0.0 &&
5835  sigmoid_self_repair_threshold <= 0.25 &&
5836  self_repair_scale >= 0.0 && self_repair_scale <= 0.1);
5837  use_dropout_ = use_dropout;
5838  params_.Resize(3, cell_dim);
5839  params_.SetRandn();
5840  params_.Scale(param_stddev);
5841  value_sum_.Resize(5, cell_dim);
5842  deriv_sum_.Resize(5, cell_dim);
5843  self_repair_config_.Resize(10);
5844  self_repair_config_.Range(0, 5).Set(sigmoid_self_repair_threshold);
5845  self_repair_config_(2) = tanh_self_repair_threshold;
5846  self_repair_config_(4) = tanh_self_repair_threshold;
5847  self_repair_config_.Range(5, 5).Set(self_repair_scale);
5848  self_repair_total_.Resize(5);
5849  count_ = 0.0;
5850  InitNaturalGradient();
5851 
5852 }
5853 
5854 void LstmNonlinearityComponent::InitNaturalGradient() {
5855  // As regards the configuration for the natural-gradient preconditioner, we
5856  // don't make it configurable from the command line-- it's unlikely that any
5857  // differences from changing this would be substantial enough to effectively
5858  // tune the configuration. Because the preconditioning code doesn't 'see' the
5859  // derivatives from individual frames, but only averages over the minibatch,
5860  // there is a fairly small amount of data available to estimate the Fisher
5861  // information matrix, so we set the rank, update period and
5862  // num-samples-history to smaller values than normal.
5863  preconditioner_.SetRank(20);
5864  preconditioner_.SetUpdatePeriod(2);
5865  preconditioner_.SetNumSamplesHistory(1000.0);
5866 }
5867 
5869 void LstmNonlinearityComponent::FreezeNaturalGradient(bool freeze) {
5870  preconditioner_.Freeze(freeze);
5871 }
5872 
5873 void LstmNonlinearityComponent::InitFromConfig(ConfigLine *cfl) {
5874  InitLearningRatesFromConfig(cfl);
5875  bool ok = true;
5876  bool use_dropout = false;
5877  int32 cell_dim;
5878  // these self-repair thresholds are the normal defaults for tanh and sigmoid
5879  // respectively. If, later on, we decide that we want to support different
5880  // self-repair config values for the individual sigmoid and tanh
5881  // nonlinearities, we can modify this code then.
5882  BaseFloat tanh_self_repair_threshold = 0.2,
5883  sigmoid_self_repair_threshold = 0.05,
5884  self_repair_scale = 1.0e-05;
5885  // param_stddev is the stddev of the parameters. it may be better to
5886  // use a smaller value but this was the default in the python scripts
5887  // for a while.
5888  BaseFloat param_stddev = 1.0;
5889  ok = ok && cfl->GetValue("cell-dim", &cell_dim);
5890  cfl->GetValue("param-stddev", &param_stddev);
5891  cfl->GetValue("tanh-self-repair-threshold",
5892  &tanh_self_repair_threshold);
5893  cfl->GetValue("sigmoid-self-repair-threshold",
5894  &sigmoid_self_repair_threshold);
5895  cfl->GetValue("self-repair-scale", &self_repair_scale);
5896  cfl->GetValue("use-dropout", &use_dropout);
5897 
5898  // We may later on want to make it possible to initialize the different
5899  // parameters w_ic, w_fc and w_oc with different biases. We'll implement
5900  // that when and if it's needed.
5901 
5902  if (cfl->HasUnusedValues())
5903  KALDI_ERR << "Could not process these elements in initializer: "
5904  << cfl->UnusedValues();
5905  if (ok) {
5906  Init(cell_dim, use_dropout, param_stddev, tanh_self_repair_threshold,
5907  sigmoid_self_repair_threshold, self_repair_scale);
5908  } else {
5909  KALDI_ERR << "Invalid initializer for layer of type "
5910  << Type() << ": \"" << cfl->WholeLine() << "\"";
5911  }
5912 }
5913 
5914 void LstmNonlinearityComponent::ConsolidateMemory() {
5915  OnlineNaturalGradient preconditioner_temp(preconditioner_);
5916  preconditioner_.Swap(&preconditioner_);
5917 }
5918 
5919 SumBlockComponent::SumBlockComponent(const SumBlockComponent &other):
5920  input_dim_(other.input_dim_), output_dim_(other.output_dim_),
5921  scale_(other.scale_) { }
5922 
5923 void SumBlockComponent::InitFromConfig(ConfigLine *cfl) {
5924  scale_ = 1.0;
5925  bool ok = cfl->GetValue("input-dim", &input_dim_) &&
5926  cfl->GetValue("output-dim", &output_dim_);
5927  if (!ok)
5928  KALDI_ERR << "input-dim and output-dim must both be provided.";
5929  if (input_dim_ <= 0 || input_dim_ % output_dim_ != 0)
5930  KALDI_ERR << "Invalid values input-dim=" << input_dim_
5931  << " output-dim=" << output_dim_;
5932  cfl->GetValue("scale", &scale_);
5933  if (cfl->HasUnusedValues())
5934  KALDI_ERR << "Could not process these elements in initializer: "
5935  << cfl->UnusedValues();
5936 }
5937 
5938 void SumBlockComponent::Read(std::istream &is, bool binary) {
5939  ExpectOneOrTwoTokens(is, binary, "<SumBlockComponent>", "<InputDim>");
5940  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &input_dim_);
5941  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<OutputDim>");
5942  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &output_dim_);
5943  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<Scale>");
5944  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &scale_);
5945  ExpectToken(is, binary, "</SumBlockComponent>");
5946 }
5947 
5948 void SumBlockComponent::Write(std::ostream &os, bool binary) const {
5949  WriteToken(os, binary, "<SumBlockComponent>");
5950  WriteToken(os, binary, "<InputDim>");
5951  WriteBasicType(os, binary, input_dim_);
5952  WriteToken(os, binary, "<OutputDim>");
5953  WriteBasicType(os, binary, output_dim_);
5954  WriteToken(os, binary, "<Scale>");
5955  WriteBasicType(os, binary, scale_);
5956  WriteToken(os, binary, "</SumBlockComponent>");
5957 }
5958 
5959 std::string SumBlockComponent::Info() const {
5960  std::ostringstream stream;
5961  stream << Type() << ", input-dim=" << input_dim_
5962  << ", output-dim=" << output_dim_
5963  << ", scale=" << scale_;
5964  return stream.str();
5965 }
5966 
5967 void* SumBlockComponent::Propagate(const ComponentPrecomputedIndexes *indexes,
5968  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in,
5969  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *out) const {
5970  KALDI_ASSERT(out->NumRows() == in.NumRows() &&
5971  out->NumCols() == output_dim_ &&
5972  in.NumCols() == input_dim_);
5973  out->AddMatBlocks(scale_, in, kNoTrans);
5974  return NULL;
5975 }
5976 
5977 void SumBlockComponent::Backprop(
5978  const std::string &debug_info,
5979  const ComponentPrecomputedIndexes *indexes,
5980  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &, //in_value
5981  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &, // out_value,
5982  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_deriv,
5983  void *memo,
5984  Component *to_update,
5985  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *in_deriv) const {
5986  if (in_deriv) {
5987  in_deriv->AddMatBlocks(scale_, out_deriv, kNoTrans);
5988  }
5989 }
5990 
5991 
5992 
5993 } // namespace nnet3
5994 } // namespace kaldi
